localization.Description_FAQ_GameMode: There are two game modes: survival and creative. In creative mode you won't need any materials to build your ships. You can change this game mode by selecting your world in your saves menu and change the settings.
localization.Quote01Text: Scientific discovery and scientific knowledge have been achieved only by those who have gone in pursuit of it without any practical purpose whatsoever in view.
localization.NotificationHintPressToJumpOffLadder: Press {0} to jump off from ladder
localization.Quote22Text: A great pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_Exception_NoAssembly: Assembly not found. Please compile script.
localization.ScreenMainMenu_DeluxeLine2: Buy it on {0} to get special content!
localization.NotificationCannotJumpIntoGravity: Jump drives cannot be used to jump into natural gravity field.
localization.PickColorFromCube: Pick color from cube into slot
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_MotorVelocity: Target velocity of the rotor; the rotor will accelerate until the target velocity is reached
localization.HelpScreen_ControllerHint5: If you are building a symmetrical ship, you can activate Symmetry Building Mode through Systems Radial Menu.
localization.Quote10Text: Nature never breaks her own laws.
localization.Hint20Text:
Did you know?
    
    
The medical room recharges your energy and health five times as fast as the survival kit.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsEnableCargoShips: Whether random cargo ships should be enabled
localization.NotificationPlayerDemoted_Scripter: You have been demoted to Scripter
localization.IngameHelp_Jetpack_Detail3: {CONTROL:JUMP} and {CONTROL:CROUCH} to fly up and down.
localization.Description_FAQ_RelativeDampeners: Relative dampeners match your speed and direction with a moving target. Press [Ctrl-{CONTROL:DAMPING}] while looking at your target. You need to be within 100 meters for it to work.
localization.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_7: A station lost some its client's due to some conflict of interest between factions and is now looking for new hires. Interested? This is where you should go.
localization.HelpScreen_ControllerHint6: You can modify voxels with Voxel Hand Tool, which can be accesed from System Radial Menu in Creative Mode. You can then place, remove, revert and paint voxels with {GAMEPAD_CONTROL:VOXEL:PRIMARY_TOOL_ACTION} , {GAMEPAD_CONTROL:VOXEL:SECONDARY_TOOL_ACTION} , {GAMEPAD_CONTROL:VOXEL:VOXEL_REVERT} and {GAMEPAD_CONTROL:VOXEL:VOXEL_PAINT} respectively.
localization.TerminalControlPanel_Warhead_SafetyToolt: When checked, the warhead can be detonated manually or by unwary handle. This does not affect automatic detonation after the countdown.
localization.HintGamepadOnly00Text:
Did you know? 
While holding a blueprint in creative mode, you can use {0} to align them to a planet's Gravity.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_LightBlinkLengh: Length of blinking as percentage of blink interval
localization.DisplayName_BlueprintClass_BuildPlanner:
Build Planner
- Click on any block from Build Planner to assemble all components
remaining for its construction.
localization.Description_FAQ_Contracts: Contracts can be accepted trough contract blocks and are a good income of space credit. They can be found at trading stations or from other players with contract blocks.
localization.Jukebox_Script_SelectInTerminal: Select tracks to play in terminal screen
localization.ProgrammableBlock_DefaultScript_Construc:
The constructor, called only once every session and
always before any other method is called. Use it to
initialize your script. 
    
The constructor is optional and can be removed if not
needed.

It's recommended to set RuntimeInfo.UpdateFrequency 
here, which will allow your script to run itself without a 
timer block.
localization.Description_FAQ_LogOut: You can use a cryo room to store your character before leaving the server. This will prevent your character from dying after some time and losing your toolbar. Make sure the room is supplied with oxygen and power.
localization.Description_FAQ_InvalidMaterial: Sorry, That material does not exist in Space Engineers.
localization.Description_FAQ_Healing: You can heal yourself at a medical room or survival kit if you are injured. Hold {CONTROL:USE} to use the console.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_CargoShipsEnabled:
Random NPC cargoships will fly through world 
from time to time
localization.Description_GatlingTurret:
Gatling turrets are configurable automated turrets that will target anything hostile within range.

Requires large calibre ammunition. Can be controlled manually from cockpit. Connect the turret with conveyors so it can pull ammunition automatically.
localization.Description_BlockGroup_LCDGroup: LCD Screens of various sizes and formats.
localization.ToolTipJoinGameServerSearch_EvnironmentH:
Show only servers with corresponding level of
environment hostility
localization.ToolTipOptionsControls_JoystickDeadzoneW: Adjust how much movement of the joystick is needed before it activates
localization.Description_FAQ_HandTools: There are 3 hand tools. A welder builds and repairs. A grinder salvages and deconstructs, while a drill is used to find ore, collect ore and dig tunnels.
localization.Description_InteriorTurret:
Interior turrets are small automated turrets for protecting interiors or act as light defences.

Requires manual reloading and small calibre ammunition. Can be controlled manually from cockpits.
localization.DisplayName_Block_LightArmorInvCorner2Ti: Light Armor Inv. Corner 2x1x1 Tip Smooth
localization.LaserAntennaCopyCoordsHelp: Copy this antenna's position into clipboard
localization.PressNumberAgain: Press number again to switch size
localization.IngameHelp_BuildingTip2_Detail1: Are you sure you have not done this before?
localization.Description_FAQ_GridMovement: Make sure it has thrusters pointing in the direction it is moving and some source of power.
localization.Description_FAQ_CooperativeMode: Cooperative mode will let assemblers automatically take a portion of the queue of another assembler, making them work together.
localization.IngameHelp_HUD_Detail1:
Cycle through the various HUD states; they differ by amount of shown information.
You can also change the way signals show up on your HUD.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_MotorBrakingTor: Braking strength of the rotor: how fast it will stop (applied when the rotor is turned off)
localization.SharedBlueprintQuestion: Do you want to open this blueprint in {0} workshop?
localization.ContractScreen_Text_NoActiveContracts: You do not have any Contract active.
localization.Description_FAQ_LeavePlanet: To leave a planet with an atmosphere you need a ship capable of going into space. The best way is to equip your ship with hydrogen thrusters and hydrogen tanks.
localization.QuickstartDX11NotAvailable: It seems that your system does not support DirectX 11, game will load scenario with no planets
localization.GuiScenarioCannotJoin: Scenario is already running, cannot join game.
localization.WorldSettings_Error_SavingFailed: There was an error trying to rename your world. Please check your saves folder for any problems.
localization.ContractScreen_ObtainDeliver_Description:
This station is in need of maintenance but we are in short supply. 
Get us the required materials and you will be paid in full.
localization.Quote51Text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
localization.Description_FAQ_FindOtherPlayers: Look for factions that allow anyone to join or ask around if you can group up with players. Look for antenna signals that could indicate other players.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_EnableResearch: Enables advancement through a progression tree
localization.HintGamepadOnly13Text:
Did you know? 
You can dig tunnels quickly without producing ore by using {0} with your drill.
localization.Description_Connector:
The connector can be magnetically locked with other connectors to allow cross grid distribution of items and power.

Toggle the magnetic lock from your toolbar or press {CONTROL:LANDING_GEAR}. Connectors will show up yellow when in range.  Unlocking it will briefly disable the magnetic function.
localization.RespawnScreeenHelpTextSpaceSpawn: You will spawn near other players in space.
localization.ControlScreen_TerminalBlockGroup: Insert name of a new block group
localization.NotificationPutToProductionSuccessful: All components were successfully put to production.
localization.HintKeyboardOnly06Text: Holding Ctrl, Shift or Ctrl-Shift enables you to move stacks of items by 10, 100 and 1000 at the time.
localization.Description_AdvancedRotorPart: The top part of an advanced rotor can be reattached to the rotor by accessing rotor settings.
localization.Description_FAQ_Encounter: Random encounters are shipwrecks, derelict vessels and pirate stations that can be found in space. They often broadcast a MAYDAY signal. Careful, exploring these encounters can be dangerous.
localization.Quote12Text: Where there is shouting, there is no true knowledge.
localization.Description_Cockpit:
Cockpits are used to control your ship.

Connect a cockpit with oxygen tanks and h2/o2 generators to supply the cockpit with oxygen.
localization.ToolTipAudioOptionsEnableReverb:
Enable sound echo. Note that if your audio rate is larger than 
48kHz, this feature will not work.
(You can configure the audio rate in system's speaker properties)
localization.Description_RailingDouble: Railings stop engineers from falling off dangerous ledges. Safety first!
localization.NotificationHintJoystickPressToOpenButto: Access control menu to setup panel's buttons
localization.ContractScreen_Aministration_FailText_Ta: Contract block for item delivery must be selected.
localization.Hint24Text:
Did you know? 
    
    
Warheads are perfectly safe until you arm them.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_SpawnWithTools:
If this is turned off, characters won't spawn with 
any tools in their inventory
localization.Hint03Text:
You can steer vehicles from a turret if the cockpit is set to main cockpit.
Hold Alt to enable mouse control.
localization.Hint13Text: Batteries will automatically charge and distribute power when necessary according to their settings.
localization.StoreBuy_Error_Text_FreePositionNotFound: There is not enough free space around the station to spawn the vehicle.
localization.Beacon_SafeZone_RangeSlider_TTIP: Change to set new safe zone range
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_EnableContainerDrop: Enable / Disable spawning of Unknown Signal
localization.Quote04Text: Science may set limits to knowledge, but should not set limits to imagination.
localization.TerminalTab_Factions_KickToolTip: Kick selected member from the faction
localization.ToolTipVideoOptionsEnableDamageEffects: Enable particle effects  for damaged blocks
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsHardwareRequirements:
Hardware requirements define how rich your world can be. 
Higher values are more demanding on computing performance 
of your computer (CPU and GPU) and will definitely require more memory.
localization.Quote16Text: Mathematics is the language in which God has written the universe.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_DefaultScript_Main:
The main entry point of the script, invoked every time
one of the programmable block's Run actions are invoked,
or the script updates itself. The updateSource argument
describes where the update came from.

The method itself is required, but the arguments above
can be removed if not needed.
localization.Description_GravityGenerator: Gravity generators create configurable artificial gravity fields that affect players and items in an otherwise zero G environment. Has diminishing effects when inside a real gravity field.
localization.Description_FAQ_Unlock: You can unlock new blocks by fully constructing other required blocks. You can see what blocks will unlock the next block by viewing them in the G screen.
localization.HintGamepadOnly11Text:
Did you know? 
You can toggle off the block auto rotation function with {0}
localization.IngameHelp_Inventory_Detail2: Press {CONTROL:USE} to pick up an item.
localization.Description_GratedCatwalkWall: Catwalks can be used to create safe walkways throughout your creations.
localization.Description_MedicalStation: A decorative station that allows engineers to examine their injuries.
localization.NotificationSuitEnergyCritical: Warning: Suit energy is critically low. Life support failure imminent.
localization.Description_BlockGroup_GravityGroup: Various blocks related to artificial gravity.
localization.IngameHelp_HUD_Detail2: Press {CONTROL:TOGGLE_HUD} to cycle through HUD states.
localization.IngameHelp_Health_Detail1: You're hurt. You can heal by interacting with the console of a powered medical bay or survival kit.
localization.Description_HangarDoor:
Hangar doors can be linked together to create large gates that can seal spaces air tight while allowing vehicles in and out. 

You can build and use a button panel to open hangar doors by interacting with it or sensors to make them open and close automatically.
localization.Description_FAQ_BlockShapes: You can access alternative block shapes if you have a block equipped on your toolbar with an + symbol. Use the scroll wheel to switch to different shapes.
localization.Description_RailingCorner: Railings stop engineers from falling off dangerous ledges. Safety first!
localization.Quote08Text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
localization.ContractScreen_Aministration_FailText_Is: Search radius has invalid value. Must be positive number.
localization.Description_ParachuteHatch:
Parachute hatches deploy parachutes to slow down the descent of ships when inside the atmosphere.

Can be configured to open automatically or used manually from the toolbar or settings.
localization.Description_GratedCatwalkStraight: Catwalks can be used to create safe walkways throughout your creations.
localization.IngameHelp_BasicRefinery_Detail1:
A basic assembler or basic refinery is more efficient at producing and refining then the survival kit but also requires more power. 

Build a battery to use your power more efficiently.
localization.Description_FAQ_GoodBot: I am Good.bot. I am here to answer your questions to the best of my ability. How can I help you?
localization.Description_DiagonalWindow: Diagonal window shutters can be used as stairs.
localization.Description_BathroomOpen: A toilet for decorating interiors. Can be used as a seat.
localization.Description_FAQ_Messages: You can send private messages to other players or factions through the Coms tab in your inventory. These messages can only be send if your antenna is enabled and in range of other players or antennas.
localization.MessageBoxTextDoYouWishToPublishScenario:
Are you sure you want to upload and publish selected scenario on {0} Workshop?
Note that by submitting this item, you agree to the workshop terms of service (see {1}).
localization.NotificationShipEnergyLow: Warning: Ship fuel is low. Life support systems may fail.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_ClientCanSave:
Client can save network game. If unchecked 
then only server can save
localization.IngameHelp_HelmetVisor_Detail2: Use {CONTROL:HELMET} to open and close your visor.
localization.FactionTerminal_Deposit_Currency_TTIP: Deposit to faction account from personal account
localization.Quote29Text: A good scientist is a person with original ideas. A good engineer is a person who makes a design that works with as few original ideas as possible. There are no prima donnas in engineering.
localization.BriefingTutorial05OreRefining: The basics of infrastructure and industry are taught in this tutorial. You will learn how to mine ores, process them in a refinery and then commission new block components to be made in the assembler from the refined elements.
localization.Description_FAQ_Platinum: Platinum is a rare material only found in asteroids and moons. There is no platinum on planets.
localization.RadialMenu_Label_CreativeOnly: Available only in creative mode or with creative tools.
localization.ToolTipOptionsAudio_MuteWhenInactive: Disable all sound when game window loses focus
localization.ScreenMedicals_NoRespawnPlace:
No respawn point is available! 
Try the refresh button for any available respawn points.
If there is no chance of accessing them, the game will be over in {0:00}:{1:00}.
localization.Description_RadioAntenna:
Antennas can be used to broadcast positions, messages HUD markers and allows grids to be accessed or controlled from a distance.

Antennas need to be able to send and receive, so make sure two antennas always overlap each other's position.
localization.Hint16Text:
Did you know?
    
    
Rovers can use their wheel suspensions to jump out of tight situations.
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_ShowPlayersToolTip: Shows all player names on HUD, even when broadcast is off.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsAutoHealing:
Auto-healing heals players only in oxygen environments 
and during periods of not taking damage. It heals up to {0}% of maximum health.
localization.IngameHelp_Movement_Detail3:Gamepad: Push {CONTROL:FORWARD} all the way to sprint forward.
localization.IngameHelp_FlyingAShip_Detail1:
A ship requires thrusters for movement, gyroscopes to orientate,  power and a cockpit. 
The controls for a ship are the same as the jetpack.
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_TeleportHereToolTip: Teleports your character to the spectator camera.
localization.HintGamepadOnly01Text:
Did you know? 
{0} and {1} are modifier keys. Try holding them while performing any action in-game. And most of the times the action will do something slightly different.
localization.BlockPropertyTitle_Projector_InstantBuil: Enable the projector to build the blueprint instantly, even in survival
localization.IngameHelp_GrinderTip_Detail1: You made quick work of that!
localization.MessageBoxCaptionRespawn:
You will lose all ownership and spawn as new player!
Respawn?
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_EnableEncounters: Random abandoned ships and stations can be encountered
localization.HintGamepadOnly07Text:
Did you know? 
If you are building a symmetrical ship, you can activate Symmetry Building Mode through System Radial Menu.
localization.TerminalControlPanel_RunCode_Tooltip: Run current script and notifies about any exception during run
localization.Hint21Text:
Did you know? 
    
    
You can manually control turrets to carefully pick off targets.
localization.TerminalTab_Factions_AcceptToolTip: Accept selected member to your faction
localization.StoreBuy_Error_Text_SpawnFailed: Vehicle was not unable to spawn.
localization.Description_ControlStation: Control stations are used to control a large ship.
localization.ContractScreen_Deliver_Description_1:
A partnered station has not been able to supply one of its customers due to a shortage.
They have requested that we will fill the gap and deliver the order as soon as possible.
Accepting this contract will require collateral and said collateral will be forfeit if you fail to complete the assignment in time.
localization.BlockActionTooltip_AddRotorHead: Tries to add a Rotor head if no head is present
localization.BuildPlannerCapacityReached: Build planner capacity reached. Components not added.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_GyroRollOverrid: Roll component of the constant torque that is applied by this gyro if the cockpit controls are overridden
localization.Hint17Text: Using a ship to grind down a container will also pick up whatever was inside of the container.
localization.BriefingTutorial07Jetpack: The jetpack tutorial displays the controls needed for flight which is followed by a series of assault course style sections to challenge your ability to fly quickly and accurately, you have a limited time from the moment you begin each section to reach the exit door. Watch out for hazards!
localization.Description_FAQ_ScreenShot: You can make screenshots by pressing F12 by default. Or if you have Nividea Ansel you can press Alt-F to enter capture mode.
localization.Hint14Text: Upgrade modules will improve the performance of your refineries and assemblers.
localization.Quote27Text: Engineers like to solve problems. If there are no problems handily available, they will create their own problems.
localization.BriefingTutorial08YourFirstShip: The true test of any engineer is the ability to build a space-worthy ship from scratch, this tutorial will provide instruction on how to build a simple one-person transport vessel. Learn how to place blocks, weld them to completion and make a simple flight, you will also be taught essential rules of ship building that you can apply to create your own designs.
localization.Contracts_Error_Text_Abandon: Contract cannot be abandoned as it has been deleted or finished by someone else.
localization.Description_FAQ_Recharging: You can recharge your suit power in medical rooms, survival kits or by sitting in any kind of seat or cockpit as long as it is powered.
localization.Description_FAQ_Help: Press {CONTROL:HELP_SCREEN} to find additional help or just ask me.
localization.IngameHelp_FlyingAShipLG_Detail1: This ship is equipped with magnetic landing gears. Toggling landing gears will temporarily disable their magnetic lock.
localization.ContractScreen_ObtainDeliver_Description:
These commodities have been in high demand lately and we are running low. 
Interested in helping out? You will be adequately compensated.
localization.IngameHelp_Inventory_Detail1: Highlighted objects can be picked up if there is room in your inventory.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_MotorUsesWheelC: Indicates whether motor is controlled like a wheel directly from cockpit
localization.NotificationHintPressToGetDownFromLadder: Press {0} to get down from ladder
localization.IngameHelp_Intro_Detail2:Gamepad: Press {CONTROL:SYSTEM_RADIAL_MENU} to open the radial menu, navigate to the [Menu] tab and and choose the [Help] option.
localization.Quote64Text: To every action there is always an equal and opposite reaction: or the forces of two bodies on each other are always equal and are directed in opposite directions.
localization.IngameHelp_IntroTip_Detail2:Gamepad:
*Tip:* You can ask me anything in the chat using ? <question> (english only). To open the chat window press {CONTROL:SYSTEM_RADIAL_MENU}, navigate to the [Menu] tab and select the [Chat] option.
In case of any troubles contact us at support@keenswh.com
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_UntargetableToolTip: Makes you invisible to all turrets.
localization.TerminalControlPanel_EditCode_Tooltip_St: Opens code editor where you can create new scripts and upload/download them from {0} workshop
localization.ProgrammableBlock_ReplaceScriptNameDialo: Script with the name  {0} already exists. Do you want to replace it?
localization.Description_RocketLauncherReload:
Reloadable rocket launchers can be connected with other inventories for automated reloading.

Requires missiles.
localization.Description_FlightSeat: Flight seats are used to control a large ship and access all of its functions.
localization.Description_ConveyorSorter:
Conveyor sorters can be configured to only pass specific items through or stop specific items from passing through.

Sorters can be used to filter out unwanted materials or to collect specific items in a container.
localization.ToolTipJoinGameServerSearch_Defaults: Restore server search settings to default value
localization.Description_LightArmor: Basic armor to give structure and shape to ships and stations. Not very durable but lightweight.
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_UseTerminalsToolTip: Allows you to use any terminal, regardless of ownership.
localization.IngameHelp_Movement_Detail2: Use {CONTROL:FORWARD} {CONTROL:BACKWARD} {CONTROL:STRAFE_LEFT} {CONTROL:STRAFE_RIGHT} keys to walk and strafe.
localization.Terminal_AuthorshipNotAvailable: Authorship operations are not available when playing with no limits.
localization.TerminalTab_GPS_NewFromClipboard_ToolTip: Create a new GPS entry from clipboard
localization.Description_Window: Transparent windows will keep the air in and space out while you enjoy the view.
localization.BroadcastScreen_TerminalButtonDisabled_T:
Cannot open terminal of target grid.
Hover over status icons for more info.
localization.IngameHelp_Camera_Detail1: Changing your point of view can be useful in many situations.
localization.BlockActionTooltip_SelectedJumpTarget: To execute the jump, assign the "Jump" command to the toolbar of a cockpit
localization.ToolTipBatteryBlock: Check for power storage, uncheck for power output
localization.Quote26Text: When you want to know how things really work, study them when they're coming apart.
localization.Description_FAQ_ArmorSkins: Armor skins are different textures and patterns for your ships and stations. They can be applied the same way you paint grids. Press P to open the paint screen.
localization.IngameHelp_Ownership_Detail1: Blocks owned by other players cannot be accessed if they are not shared with others. You can hack blocks by replacing their computer parts  with a grinder and welder to gain access.
localization.Quote53Text: The path of a cosmonaut is not an easy, triumphant march to glory. You have to get to know the meaning not just of joy but also of grief, before being allowed in the spacecraft cabin.
localization.HintKeyboardOnly02Text:
Did you know? 
    
    
Shift-{0} will directly bring you to the antenna menu.
localization.DeleteBlueprintQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete this blueprint?
localization.ContractScreen_Aministration_FailText_Is: Currency reward has invalid value. Must be non-negative number.
localization.Description_FAQ_Objective_Q4: What do I have to do
localization.IngameHelp_Turbine2_Detail1: Your base will require more power as you add more functional blocks. Be sure to build more wind turbines or solar panels or turn blocks off to prevent them from consuming power.
localization.Description_Assembler:
Assemblers are highly advanced machines capable of producing tools and components.

Requires ingots and power to produce components.
localization.AdminMenuNotAvailable: Admin menu is available only when you're admin or when admin promotes you to Observer and beyond
localization.Hint22Text:
Did you know? 
    
    
Your magnetic boots only work when there is no gravity around.
localization.IngameHelp_Stuck_Detail3: Press {0} to toggle landing gears, brakes and connectors.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_Editor_CheckCode_Toolt: Checks code inside editor for errors
localization.IngameHelp_Building_Detail2_Gamepad: Press {CONTROL:TOOLBAR_RADIAL_MENU} to open the [Building Radial Menu].
localization.TerminalTab_Info_ConvertToStationButton_:
Converts this ship to a station.
Ship has to be stationary in order to convert it to a station
(both angular and linear velocity have to be 0).
Stations are more performance friendly.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_Editor_RememberCode_To: Remember current script and leave editor window open
localization.ContractScreen_Repair_Description_2: Scavengers have been targeting our equipment lately. Check our equipment for damage and return it to top condition.
localization.Quote39Text: Scientists investigate that which already is; engineers create that which has never been.
localization.BriefingTutorial03Energy:
Learn how to recharge your suit energy by tackling a series of small challenges that 
  explain the behaviour of power within Space Engineers and the different ways you can provide it.
localization.ToolTipNewGame_NoWorkshopWorld: There are no subscribed Workshop worlds. You can visit {0} Workshop and download them here:
localization.TerminalTab_Factions_BeforeCreateLeave: You must leave your faction before creating new one
localization.RadialMenu_Label_VoxelHand_Survival: Available only in Creative mode or with creative tools.
localization.Description_LaserAntenna:
Laser antennas do not broadcast a signal that other players can see but instead require direct line of sight to function.

This antenna is connected by using GPS coordinates.
localization.Description_FAQ_BuildMode: You can toggle different building modes by pressing B.
localization.Description_FAQ_MirrorMode: Mirror mode only works in creative mode and allows symmetric building. Press {CONTROL:SYMMETRY_SWITCH} to cycle through all six planes of mirrors. Use LMB button to confirm placement and RMB to remove one. Press {CONTROL:USE_SYMMETRY} to temporarily disable mirror mode.
localization.BriefingTutorial10Grids: This tutorial aims to illuminate the nature of small, large and station grids, the rules that govern them and how you can join them with the merge block. There is also a brief section on floating objects.
localization.Description_OpenCockpitSmall: This control seat can be used to pilot anything from modest rovers to small-scale ships; they're also exceptionally comfortable.
localization.NotificationJumpAbortedShortDistance: Jump was aborted, distance too short.
localization.HintGamepadOnly12Text:
Did you know? 
You can steer vehicles from a turret if the cockpit is set to main cockpit.
Hold {0} to control turning around.
localization.GuiScenarioEdit_CopyIdsTooltip: You can then paste them into "Block destroyed" trigger
localization.Description_FAQ_Gravity: There is gravity on planets. Virtual Gravity can also be produced with the gravity generator block. Virtual gravity has no effect on grids unless virtual mass blocks are implemented.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_DefaultScript_Save:
Called when the program needs to save its state. Use
this method to save your state to the Storage field
or some other means. 

This method is optional and can be removed if not
needed.
localization.Hint09Text:
Did you know? 
    
    
Rocks on the surface of planets often contain valuable resources.
localization.MessageBoxTextWatchVideo: Would you like to watch video before tutorial starts?
localization.Quote38Text: To the optimist, the glass is half full. To the pessimist, the glass is half empty. To the engineer, the glass is twice as big as it needs to be.
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_AddReputation_Reput:
Propagate reputation to friends and enemies of faction. 
Warning: Propagation of positive and negative reputation is not symmetric.
Propagating 1000 and then -1000 won't have zero sum for friends and foes of the faction.
localization.Description_EffectivenessModule: Yield modules increase production yield of refineries when connected.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsMaxGridSize: Maximum size (in blocks) of ships and stations
localization.IngameHelp_BuildingTip_Detail2: *Tip:* Blocks with a + symbol have variations available that you can scroll through.
localization.Description_FAQ_Experimental: Experimental mode is a setting that enables features that are considered unstable and can possibly cause performance issues. Experimental mode can be enabled in game settings.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsPVP:
PvE means that you cannot damage other players. PvP 
means that you can damage them and they can damage you.
localization.NotificationObstructingBlockDuringMerge: Cannot merge ships! Some blocks would occupy the same space after the merge!
localization.AdminScreen_Safezone_Collision: Safe zone collision. Reduce radius until no safezones are overlapping.
localization.Description_Shower: A shower for decorating interiors and an ideal place to practice singing. Show everyone you care about hygiene.
localization.KeepProjectionTooltip: Keep projection after building is complete. Useful for automated building, but can degrade performance.
localization.NotificationJumpAbortedAlreadyJumping: Jump was aborted, connected grid is already jumping.
localization.TooltipWorldSettingsRespawnShipDelete: Deletes respawn ship when player leaves server / spawns in new ship
localization.Description_GratedCatwalk: Catwalks can be used to create safe walkways throughout your creations.
localization.Description_CryoChamber:
Cryo rooms can store players while they are disconnected from a server.

Reduced oxygen consumption for player. Stores toolbar while offline. Connect the cryo room with Oxygen tanks, h2/o2 generators or oxygen farms with conveyors to supply oxygen.
localization.IngameHelp_ComponentsTip_Detail1: Your skills are quickly becoming superior to mine!
localization.SteamOverlayDisabledText: Please enable {0} Overlay in {0} client: go to Settings, In-game tab, Enable {0} Community In-Game and in {0} Library, Space Engineers, Properties, Enable {0} Community In-Game
localization.DisplayName_BlueprintClass_BasicSmallBlo:
Basic Small Blocks
- Click on any Small Block to assemble all components
necessary for it's construction.

Oxygen is produced from ice in a h2/o2 generator or by oxygen farms. Use an oxygen tank for storage and conveyors to connect the blocks.

localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsSoundInSpace: There's no sound in space. Turn it on to simulate Earth-like sound conditions (even though it's not realistic). Turn it off for a realistic mode where you can hear only sounds that your astronaut character can hear.

localization.Description_ControlPanel:

Gyroscopes allow ships to orientate using the mouse movements and stabilize rotating grids.

Build more gyroscopes to increase sensitivity and the speed that a grid can turn.

localization.IngameHelp_Temperature_Detail1:
Temperature affects how quickly your suit energy drains. Hot or cold temperatures will hurt you when your suit is out of power.

localization.WelcomeScreen_Text3:
If you experience any issues, please do not hesitate to visit the support site or our Discord server where there are developers and many experienced players available to assist you!

If you're interested in seeing some of the potential of Space Engineers, be sure to visit the {0} Community Hub. We look forward to seeing your creations and screenshots on there in the future. Good luck engineering your dreams!
localization.Description_FAQ_Hacking: Hacking a block can be done by using a grinder to remove the computer components from a block and placing them back with a welder to gain acces to the block.
localization.ChatBot_Generic: Hello, Engineer! I am Good.bot. What can I help you with?

localization.BriefingTutorial04Oxygen: This tutorial covers the various oxygen related blocks, oxygen farms, generators, vents, bottles, tanks and ice, including their control panel functions. The concept of creating an airtight room for pressurization is also addressed.

localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsHarvestingMode:
Creative Mode: unlimited resources, instant building, players don't die. Use creative mode when you
just want to build things.

Survival Mode: realistic inventory capacity, constrained resources - you have to drill and harvest ore, process it
in a refinery, construct components in assembler, build blocks using welder, disassemble using grinder,
players can die - they re-spawn in their spawn point and if there's no spawn point available, then in a new ship
as a new player at the border of the sector.

Survival x3: same as "Survival", but 3x larger inventory capacity.

Survival x10: same as "Survival", but 10x larger inventory capacity.

localization.Description_FAQ_Armor: Armor is used to design the structure of ships and stations, and acts as protection for important blocks. Light armor is cheap and enables ships to be fast. Heavy armor offers more protection for ships, but it affects these vehicles' speed.

localization.RemoteAccess_Description:
You can remotely access grids in the world using the antenna in your suit. Make sure your antenna is enabled.
(Check the antenna symbol in the bottom left corner of the in-game HUD)

To access a grid, it must be powered and have an antenna. You also need to stay within the antenna broadcast range to be able to access it.

You can control grids from a distance by equipping them with a remote control block.

localization.WelcomeScreen_Text2:
A space engineer is a professional practitioner who uses scientific knowledge, mathematics, physics, astronomy, propulsion technology, materials science, structural analysis, manufacturing, and ingenuity to solve practical problems in space and on planets.

Space engineers take pride in their ability to get the job done right. No matter how big, how complex, or how remote.
localization.Description_FAQ_Painting: While holding a block, you can paint blocks with {CONTROL:CUBE_COLOR_CHANGE}. Press K to access more colour options. Use Ctrl-{CONTROL:CUBE_COLOR_CHANGE} or Shift-{CONTROL:CUBE_COLOR_CHANGE} to paint large surfaces.

A friend of mine who works on a remote station called in saying he has some contracts ready. 
They pay a good amount so if you are looking for a job then that's the place to go. Good luck!

localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_ReplayTool_Tutorial:
How to use the Replay Tool:
1. Add as many characters as you need,
then position them how you want them
and save the world.
2. Switch to the character you wish
to control using F6.
3. Click 'Record + Replay', and move
the character as you wish.
4. Press escape to stop recording.
5. Reload the world, do not save!.
6. Repeat from step 2.

If you wish to clear the recorded data, press
Delete Recordings to start over.

If you wish to observe the recorded data,
press 'Replay' and watch as the game
replays the data.

If you wish to store the recorded data,
reload the world, then save the game.
Then, it will carry over to other sessions.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsThrusterDamage: Thruster flame deals damage to blocks, players and small objects
localization.ControlScreen_TransferCombobox: Transfer ownership of selected blocks to another player/faction

localization.Quote60Text: Every body persists in its state of being at rest or of moving uniformly straight forward, except insofar as it is compelled to change its state by force impressed.
localization.ContractScreen_ObtainDeliver_Description:
A client of ours has requested some specific goods they wish delivered to this station for pickup.
Obtain the goods and then deliver them to us. We will ensure you are adequately rewarded.
localization.Hint26Text:
Did you know?
    
    
Pressurized environments will maintain optimal temperatures and recharge your health and oxygen.

When enabled, each player can see name of other
players above their characters

localization.Description_Suspension: Suspensions are highly durable and enable vehicles to drive over most terrains.
localization.Description_BlockGroup_InputOutputGroup: Blocks that are responsible for input and output from conveyor system.
localization.Description_FAQ_ProtectingMyself: Hide your bases underground or inside asteroids. Build turrets and decoys to defend against attacks. Build hidden medical rooms and spread them out to maintain ways to respawn when attacked from inside you base.
localization.Connector_TemporaryBlock: Connection failed. Connector will unblock in {0} seconds.
localization.Quote36Text: Space engineers take pride for their ability to get the job done right - no matter how big, how complex, or how remote.
localization.Description_FAQ_Drones: Drones are small unmanned ships that can either be remote controlled, script controlled or sometimes controlled by sensors and timer blocks.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_StationVoxelSupport:
By enabling this option grids will no longer turn
dynamic when disconnected from static grids
localization.IngameHelp_WheeledVehiclesTip_Detail2: *Tip:* Be careful not to go too fast with Wheeled Vehicles, which can flip over easily.
localization.IngameHelp_HUDTip_Detail2: *Tip:* HUD signals can be individually disabled in your terminal control panel.
localization.QuickstartSelectDifferent: Please select scenario with no planets
localization.ProgrammableBlock_Exception_NoValidConst: This program has no valid constructor.
localization.Description_Beacon: A beacon is used to broadcast its position.
localization.Quote28Text: One man's "magic" is another man's engineering. "Supernatural" is a null word.
localization.IngameHelp_Pod3_Detail1: The first thing to do is to gather stone using your hand drill. Equip your drill, find some stone and store it in the survival kit on the back of your pod. Then access the production tab of your pod and produce ingots.
localization.ScreenTerminalError_ShipHasBeenDisconnec: Ship has been disconnected from terminal
localization.ContractScreen_ObtainDeliver_Description:
Some of our stock has not been able to keep up with demand.
Help us resupply and you will be paid a fair price.
localization.LaserAntennaOnlyPerm: Only receivers set to permanent connection found
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_ToolShake: Enable shaking of ship drills and grinders
localization.Description_Collector: Collectors collects items when they get close to the collector's funnel.
localization.Description_RailingDiagonal: Railings stop engineers from falling off dangerous ledges. Safety first!
localization.Description_BlockGroup_EnergyRenewableGr: Power provider blocks, that are draining energy from renewable sources: wind and sun.
localization.Description_RotorPart:
The rotor part is the top section of the rotor.

It can be reattached with a rotor within rotor settings.
localization.NotificationCannotJumpOutsideWorld: Jump drives cannot be used to jump outside world limits.
localization.SafeZoneBlock_Safezone_Collision:
Safe zone collision.
Reduce radius or move it
localization.ContractScreen_Escort_Description_3:
One of our transports is experiencing technical difficulties and some vultures seemed to have taken notice. 
Go out there and protect the transport. Make them think twice. You will be rewarded based on how well you performed.
localization.TerminalTab_Info_DestructibleBlocks_Tool: Toogles destructible blocks only for this grid. If destructible blocks are disabled in world settings, this is ignored. Only available in scenarios.
localization.IngameHelp_HUD_Detail3: Press {CONTROL:TOGGLE_SIGNALS} to cycle through signal states.
localization.IngameHelp_JetpackTip_Detail2:Gamepad: *Tip:* Use the relative dampening mode (auto) to match the velocity of the ship under the cursor.
localization.TerminalTab_GPS_ShowOnHud_ToolTip: Display this GPS marker on in-game HUD.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_Motor_Suspensio: Wheels will not be propeled over this speed
localization.Description_FAQ_MagneticBoots: Magnetic boots only work in zero gravity environments. They enable you to stick to surfaces like asteroids or ships. Press {CONTROL:THRUSTS} to disable your jetpack and enable your magnetic boots when in a standing position on a surface.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsTotalPCU:
Total amount of PCU in world. PCU is then global, per faction or per player.
Each block built costs some PCU, destroyed blocks are refunded.
localization.Description_Freight: Crates left scattered around, indicating hard working engineers have been working in the area.
localization.Notification_NoControlLowerPriority:
Grid control forbidden.
Seat/Remote with higher priority is already occupied.
localization.MessageBoxTextAreYouSureEnableOxygenPres: Are you sure you want to enable airtightness? This can have negative influence to performance.
localization.BlockPropertiesText_HeadAttachingSpecifi: Looking for specific Head to attach
localization.NoticeLine_03: Space Engineers® and VRAGE™ are trademarks of KEEN SWH LTD.
localization.TerminalTab_Factions_CreateFactionTagToo: Faction tag must be exactly 3 characters long
localization.NotificationPlayerPromoted_Admin: You have been promoted to Administrator
localization.IngameHelp_RefiningOre_Detail1:
Ore and scrap metal can be refined into ingots in a powered Refinery. 
Ingots can be used to produce components, tools and weapons.
Refineries will automatically pull resources and refine them.
localization.DisplayName_BlueprintClass_BasicLargeBlo:
Basic Large Blocks
- Click on any Large Block to assemble all components
necessary for it's construction.
localization.ContractScreen_Escort_Description_2:
It looks like one of our competitors decided to resort to less conventional ways to beat the competition. 
Report to our cargo ship and keep it safe. Let them know we mean business. 
You will be rewarded based on your performance.
localization.HintGamepadOnly08Text:
Did you know? 
Holding {0}, {1} or {0}-{1} enables you to move stacks of items by 10, 100 and 1000 at the time.
localization.IngameHelp_CameraTip_Detail1: You will be building in no time!
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_SensorFieldFron: How far the sensing field extends in front of the sensor
localization.NotificationLimitsPerBlockType: Maximum blocks of specific type limit reached.
localization.Description_FAQ_Suit: Your suit keeps you alive when you are in space. Your health, hydrogen, oxygen and power supplies are displayed on your HUD. Your suit is equipped with magnetic boots to walk in space and a jetpack to fly.
localization.ScreenBlueprintsRew_Tooltip_ButReplace: Replace blueprint with clipboard (local or cloud BP) or script from editor (local scripts only)
localization.ContractScreen_Aministration_FailText_Is: Duration has invalid value. Must be non-negative number.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_MotorTorque: The torque of the rotor: how fast it will accelerate (applied when the rotor is turned on)
localization.IngameHelp_Building3_Detail1: In survival mode you need the first component of a block to place it. You can produce components in assembler or salvage them from other blocks with a grinder.
localization.Description_FAQ_Ownership: You can own blocks when you are the one who added the computer components. You can choose to share your blocks with your faction or anybody else.
localization.IngameHelp_StuckTip_Detail2: *Tip:* Always make sure your vehicle has enough fuel before leaving your base.
localization.IngameHelp_Jetpack_Detail1: Your jetpack runs on hydrogen fuel. Be careful not to run out of it while flying.
localization.Description_ReflectorLight: Spotlights are powerful lights used to illuminate dark areas.
localization.NotificationShipEnergyCritical: Warning: Ship fuel is critically low. Life support failure imminent.
localization.Description_FAQ_Fuel: Reactors use refined uranium ingots for fuel. Your jetpack and hydrogen thrusters require hydrogen.
localization.SkinNotOwned: You don't own selected skin. Do you want to visit DLC store?
localization.ControlScreen_TerminalBlockGroupSaveDisa:
You need to insert a group name  
before you can create a new block group
localization.Descripton_ConveyorJunction: Use conveyor tubes and junctions to connect inventories of blocks so that items and gases can move freely from one inventory to another.
localization.ScreenBlueprintsRew_Tooltip_ButRefresh: Reload all blueprints/scripts and refresh the list
localization.TerminalTab_GPS_AlwaysVisible_Tooltip: Prevents this GPS coordinate from getting clustered or fading out
localization.NotificationRespawnShipDelete: Temporary ship. It will get removed after you leave the game or spawn in a new one.
localization.Description_LabEquipment: Whether you’re conducting experiments or you simply want to look smart, lab equipment is perfect for decorating interiors.
localization.NotificationLimitsNoFaction: Player without faction can not build. Press {0} to join a faction.
localization.Quote35Text: Space engineers are in a high demand, especially since the Second Space Race of 2029.
localization.Description_FAQ_Ammo: You can create ammunition for your weapons and turrets in the advanced assembler if you have the right materials available.
localization.Description_FAQ_DisableHints: To disable Good.bot hints, press Escape, go to Options, go to Game and disable "Show Good.bot hints".
localization.Quote19Text: If anybody says he can think about quantum problems without getting giddy, that only shows he has not understood the first thing about them.
localization.Description_Desk: A desk for decorating interiors. Can be used as a seat.
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_ReplayTool_RecordAn: Starts replay of stored data, as well as begins recording data for the current selected character.
localization.Description_FAQ_BlockLimit: Block limits sets a limit to how many of each type of block each player can build to ensure server performance. Block limits can be disabled in the world settings.
localization.Description_ProductivityModule: Speed modules increase the production speed of refineries or assemblers when connected.
localization.Description_FAQ_Mass: Mass indicates the weight of your ship. Filling cargo containers with ores or components can severely impact the performance of your ship.
localization.MessageBoxTextScenarioPublished: Publish has been completed successfully. If you have {0} Overlay enabled, a page will open and you can edit attributes such as title, description or visibility (it is public by default).
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Miner0: For the highest grade of minerals and gases come visit us.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_Error_ScriptsDisabled: Error: This world has disabled scripts.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_EnableConvertToStat: Add option to ship's terminal to convert ship to station
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_InvulnerableToolTip: Makes you invulnerable to all damage.
localization.Hint27Text:
Did you know?
    
    
Blocks that are destroyed during collisions or combat can cause damage around them.
localization.IngameHelp_EconomyStation_Desc: Economy Stations can appear anywhere in space, on moons, planets and in orbit. These stations offer trade and contracts depending on their respective factions.
localization.HelpScreen_ControllerHint2: You can change Saturation and Value of the selected color with {GAMEPAD:AXIS_DPAD} while recoloring.
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_AddCurrency_Player_: Player or faction whose currency will be modified.
localization.HintKeyboardOnly03Text:
Did you know? 
    
    
Double click while wielding a tool will keep it continuously working.
localization.ToolTipTerminalInventory_HideEmpty: Show only inventories that are not empty
localization.Description_FAQ_SafeZoneBlock: The safe zone block projects a configurable zone to protect your base. The safe zone block requires power and zone chips to function. Zone chips can be bought from trading stations.
localization.Description_FAQ_ContractBlock: A Contract block lets you set up your own contracts for other players to complete. You can also accept contracts from Trading stations.
localization.Description_FAQ_Temperature: Temperature affects your suit systems and will drain your power faster in extreme conditions. Without power your suit will no longer protect you against extreme conditions and you may start taking damage.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_EnableSunRotation: Sun moves around to create day and night
localization.ToolTipOptionsAudio_MusicVolume: Configure volume level of in-game music
localization.Description_PowerGenerator: The hydrogen engine converts hydrogen into power and has its own internal hydrogen tank.
localization.IngameHelp_Building_Detail2: Press {CONTROL:BUILD_SCREEN} to open toolbar config screen.
localization.BuildPlannerHint: Use {0}/{1} to add/remove to/from Build planner

Did you know?
    
    
you can open the color picker by pressing {0}.
localization.ToolTipSafeZone_AddContained: Add all entities inside safe zone to the filter
localization.NotificationProjectorGridSize: Incorrect grid size. Blueprint size must match that of the projector.
localization.IngameHelp_InteractiveTip_Detail2: *Tip:* Build control panels to easily access ship menus.
localization.ScreenBlueprintsRew_ReplaceMessage2: " already exists. Do you want to replace it?
localization.IngameHelp_Flashlight_Detail1: Use your flashlight when entering dark areas.
localization.Description_FAQ_BuildPlanner: The build planner helps you to quickly access the components required to build blocks. Use your welders RMB function to add a block to your component list. Use the withdraw button from any inventories to automatically collect the required components if available and accessible.
localization.Antenna_IgnoreAlliedBroadcastTooltip: Ignores broadcasts sent by friendly antenna that do not belong to you
localization.IngameHelp_Pod2_Detail1: The survival kit, if powered, will let you respawn, regenerate your health and energy and is capable of producing small amounts of ingots from stone that you can then produce into components.
localization.Description_BlockGroup_UpgradeModuleGrou: Various upgrade modules for production blocks, like refinery or assembler.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsEnableCopyPaste:
Copy paste allows you to create new ship or 
station directly from clipboard
localization.QuickstartNoDx9SelectDifferent: It seems that your system does not support DirectX 11, please select scenario with no planets
localization.Description_FAQ_Planets: Planets can be seen from any distance. If you do not see planets then they are likely not part of this world.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsMaxBackupSaves:
Configure the maximum number of saves that 
should be backed up. The backup folder is located
on the respective save directory. When this is 0 then 
the backup feature is disabled and all backups are 
deleted upon save!
localization.Description_Reactor: Reactors generate high amounts of power at the cost of refined uranium ingots.
localization.ToolTipTerminalInventory_FilterShip: Show only inventories of the current ship
localization.IngameHelp_Building2_Detail2: Select the same block twice on your toolbar to pick a size.
localization.Description_FullCoverWall: Armored walls provide cover in interiors or can be used to prevent players from walking off ledges.
localization.ToolTipJoinGameDirectConnect_Favorite: Check to add this IP to your favorite servers list
localization.IngameHelp_Ingots_Detail1: Ingots can be used by a survival kit or assembler to produce components, tools and weapons. You can select what component to produce in the assembler's or survival kit's menu.
localization.ScreenTerminalError_ShipNotConnected: Terminal is not connected to any ship
localization.Description_MedicalRoom: The Medical room enables you to respawn, change your appearance and recharge your health and energy much faster than the survival kit.
localization.ContractScreen_GridSelection_Text: Select vehicle or character whose inventory contains items for this contract. Items will be removed from inventories of the selected one. You may select only yourself or vehicles you own.
localization.IngameHelp_FlyingAShip_Detail3: Use {CONTROL:JUMP} and {CONTROL:CROUCH} to go up and down.
localization.ScreenBlueprintsRew_Tooltip_ButSort: Toggle between sorts "None", "alphabetical", "Creation date" and "Update date"
localization.GDPR_Text2: By clicking Yes you agree to collect personal data according to GDPR. Read more info in our Privacy policy.
localization.Description_Camera:
The camera allows you to view remote locations and zoom in on distant objects.

Set up cameras on ship toolbars so you can zoom while using weapons or look behind you while docking.
localization.HintKeyboardOnly01Text:
Did you know? 
    
    
You can toggle off the block auto rotation function with {0}.
localization.Description_FAQ_ShipToolsWeapons: Tools can be added to your toolbars by pressing {CONTROL:BUILD_SCREEN}. Drag and drop or right-click tools to automatically add them to your toolbar. This works the same for ship functions when you are inside a cockpit.
localization.ContractScreen_Administration_SelectionT: Select one of your contract block that will serve as deliver point for items
localization.SafeZone_Texture_DLCReq_TTIP: Economy DLC Required. Changes texture of safe zone.
localization.TooltipBuildScreen_BuildPlanner:
Click to add selected block variant or drag and drop the block here.
MMB on a block to quickly add it to the Build Planner.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_GyroPitchOverri: Pitch component of the constant torque that is applied by this gyro if the cockpit controls are overridden
localization.HintGamepadOnly09Text:
Did you know? 
You can trigger Emotes Toolbar by holding {0}+{1}.
localization.NotificationPutToProductionFailed: {0} component(s) could not be put to production.
localization.Description_AtmosphericThrust: Atmospheric thrusters can only functions in planetary atmospheres.
localization.TerminalTab_Factions_ShareProgressToolTi: Share your block unlock progress with selected member.
localization.ScreenBlueprintsRew_NoWorkshopScripts: There are no subscribed Workshop scripts. You can visit {0} Workshop and download them here:
localization.MessageBoxTextAreYouSureEnableOxygen: Are you sure you want to enable oxygen? Doing so will cause materials on untouched asteroids to change. This is irreversible.
localization.ReputationBat_Tooltip_Hostile:
Hostile relation
From {0} to {1} reputation.
Unable to interact, attacked on sight.
localization.Hint19Text:
Did you know?
    
    
You can use sensors to detect enemies located underground who are attempting to infiltrate your base.
localization.Description_FAQ_Ice: Ice is essential to produce oxygen and hydrogen and can be found on planets and inside asteroids.
localization.Description_FAQ_Lost: If you find yourself lost, you can always press {CONTROL:SUICIDE} to respawn at your nearest respawn point.
localization.ContractScreen_Deliver_Description_0:
A priority package is to be delivered to a client of us and we are looking for the right person for the job.
You will pay a mandatory collateral upon accepting this contract.
Failing to complete the contract within the time limit will result our client being quite unpleased with our services and your collateral will be lost. 
We are sure you are up to the task.
localization.BriefingTutorial01Movements: Learn movement essentials, how to keep your engineer alive with life support energy and oxygen and how to use each of the character tools, the welder, grinder and hand drill.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_LightFalloff: Exponential falloff of the light (1 = linear, 2 = quadratic, etc)
localization.Description_PassengerSeat: A passenger seat can be used to transport other players.
localization.Quote48Text: I see Earth! It is so beautiful!
localization.UGCService_Email: Insert your email address to login to {0}: (temporary)
localization.Description_ShipWelder:
A Ship welder is a utility tool that can construct blueprints and blocks using components from its inventory.

Can be used from a cockpit or turned on manually. Be careful not to get too close while it's active. 
Press RMB to put missing components to Build Planner.
localization.IngameHelp_Energy_Detail1: Your energy is getting low. Interact with a powered medical bay or survival kit to recharge your energy or use any kind of cockpit. Your tools need energy to function.
localization.Description_FAQ_Emotes: Emotes are character animations that can be equipped on your toolbar from the G-screen or played by opening chat and entering / followed by the name of the emote you wish to play. for example: /EmoteName
localization.Description_FAQ_Voxel: Voxels are physical bodies such as asteroids or planets. Use your drill to bore into voxels and alter their shape. Use voxel hands in creative mode to create your own shapes.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsLimitWorldSize:
When set, the game area is limited to a cube with 
the side length set to the chosen size.
All objects that leave the game area will be 
removed from the game.
Characters leaving the game area will be killed.
localization.ToolTipTerminalInventory_AddComponents:
Add components from Build Planner to production queue

Shortcuts for conveyor port interaction: 
Shift+{0} - Add components to production
Shift+Ctrl+{0} - Add components to production 10x
localization.Quote66Text: To be termed scientific, a method of inquiry must be based on empirical and measurable evidence subject to specific principles of reasoning.
localization.IngameHelp_Rifle_Detail1: A basic weapon to protect yourself; requires small calibre ammunition.
localization.IngameHelp_OwnershipTip_Detail2: *Tip:* You can configure ownership to share it with friends. Remember, you can find additional information anytime in the help screen by pressing {CONTROL:HELP_SCREEN}.
localization.StoreBuy_Error_Text_NotEnoughMoney: Transaction failed. You don't have enough money.
localization.Economy_FactionIcon_Tooltip_BuyEconomy: Buy Economy DLC to unlock these faction icons
localization.Description_HydrogenTank:
Hydrogen tanks are used for storing hydrogen fuel.

Hydrogen is used for hydrogen thrusters, engines or jetpack fuel. Hydrogen can be produced from ice in a h2/o2 generator. Can store and refill hydrogen bottles.
localization.BlockPropertyPopup_AutoPilotToolbarOpen: Set actions to be done when autopilot reaches this waypoint
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Miner1: We procure all manner of ores and gases, so you don't have to.
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_AddReputation_Playe: Player whose relation will be modified.
localization.Description_FAQ_Station: A station is a grid that is static and directly attached to voxels like planets or asteroids. Some stations can fly, but only have enough thrusters for basic movement.
localization.Description_HydrogenThrust:
Hydrogen thrusters are powerful thrusters that consume hydrogen and function in every environment.

Hydrogen can be produced from ice in a h2/o2 generator. Use a hydrogen tank for storage. Use Conveyors to transport the hydrogen.
localization.MessageBoxTextAreYouSureToRemoveAsteroid: Are you sure you want to delete selected asteroid? (this can not be undone!)
localization.Description_FAQ_Bug: You can report bugs and problems with the game at the forums or visit https://support.keenswh.com/
localization.BroadcastScreen_TakeControlButton_NoMain: Multiple Remote Controllers on grid. Set one as main!
localization.Description_FAQ_BasicMovement: Use {CONTROL:FORWARD} {CONTROL:STRAFE_LEFT} {CONTROL:BACKWARD} {CONTROL:STRAFE_RIGHT} to move, Hold {CONTROL:SPRINT} to sprint, Toggle {CONTROL:SWITCH_WALK} to walk. Use {CONTROL:CROUCH} to crouch and {CONTROL:JUMP} to jump.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_Depressurize: The vent will remove air from the room and store it in tanks
localization.Description_Door: Doors can seal off interiors and make them air tight while still allowing access for the player.
localization.IngameHelp_Stuck_Detail2: Press {0} to toggle power on and off.
localization.BlockPropertyTitle_Projector_BlocksPerPr: The maximum number of blocks a projection can have when building instantly
localization.ToolTipOptionsDisplay_ScreenshotMultipli: Choose how big screenshots will be in multipliers of current window size
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_SensorFieldTop: How far the sensing field extends above the sensor's position
localization.Description_FAQ_WhatIsABlock: Blocks are what all ships and stations are made off. There are two sizes: large and small. You can find blocks in the menu by pressing {CONTROL:BUILD_SCREEN}.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_GyroYawOverride: Yaw component of the constant torque that is applied by this gyro if the cockpit controls are overridden
localization.Description_Welder: A tool for building and repairing. Hold Left Mouse Button to weld. Press Right Mouse Button to put missing components to Build Planner.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_EnableDrones:
Random NPC pirate ship will be generated from time to time.
These ships are enemies and will try to attack you with their drones.
localization.Description_FAQ_Airlock: An airlock permits the player to move freely in and out while keeping the interior pressurized. The easiest way to achieve this is by building a set of parallel doors but can be made much more advanced with air vents, timer blocks, button panels or scripts.
localization.Description_FAQ_PCU: PCU stands for Performance Cost Unit.  Building and removing blocks cost and refunds PCU.
localization.TerminalTab_Info_RemoveGrid: Remove whole grid from the world
localization.ProgrammableBlock_ReplaceScriptDialogTex: Are you sure to replace existing script with new one from editor ?
localization.IngameHelp_FlyingAShipLGTip_Detail2: *Tip:* Landing gears can be used to pick up other grids and move them around.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsMaxFloatingObjects:
Maximum number of small objects floating in 
space (ore, ingots, components) Warning - values 
higher than 64 can significantly affect performance!
localization.Description_GravityGeneratorSphere: Spherical gravity generators create a configurable artificial spherical gravity field that affects players and items in an otherwise zero G environment. Has diminishing effects when inside a real gravity field.
localization.Description_FAQ_Commands: Use /help to find all chat comands.
localization.TerminalTab_Info_TrianglesTooltip:
Number of triangles for drawing. Technical information.
Higher numbers affect performance.
localization.Contracts_Error_Text_ActivationCondition: You do not meet requirements to accept this contract. You have not enough space in inventory.
localization.Quote21Text: Scientists are explorers. Philosophers are tourists.
localization.Description_SpaceCredit: A Space Credit is a currency used for trading.
localization.WwwLinkNotAllowed:
This link is not allowed and will not open.
Allowed sites: {0}community, youtube, KSH forum.
localization.TerminalTab_GPS_Delete_Disabled_ToolTip:
You have to select a GPS entry
before you can remove it
localization.IngameHelp_CameraTip_Detail2: *Tip:* Third person camera will switch to first person if there are objects in your way.
localization.NoticeLine_06: ©Copyright 1999-2008 Havok.com, Inc (and its Licensors). All Rights Reserved.
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Builder2: Reliable, durable, Safe. These words mark our selection of our terrestrial and extraterrestrial vehicles.
localization.IngameHelp_WelderTip_Detail2: *Tip:* Use the {CONTROL:TOOLS:SECONDARY_TOOL_ACTION} to store components from your inventory into a block under construction.
localization.Quote24Text: I know one thing: that I know nothing.
localization.Description_FAQ_ConvertGrid: You can convert grids from station to ship or ship into station in a grid's info screen if this is enabled in the world settings.
localization.NotificationPlayerPromoted_SpaceMaster: You have been promoted to Space Master
localization.Description_FAQ_TradeStations: Trade stations can spawn on planets, moons in orbit or in deep space. Depending on what faction owns the trade station it can sell Ores, components, amunitions, fuel and ships and let you do contracts for them.
localization.Quote02Text: Give me a lever long enough and a fulcrum on which to place it, and I shall move the world.
localization.IngameHelp_Interactive_Detail1: Many blocks like doors, button panels, consoles, medical rooms, inventories and cockpits support various different actions.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_Motor_SteerRetu: The wheel's return speed from turning
localization.BriefingTutorial09ShipFlight: This tutorial offers instruction on how to fly a ship and use the three ship tools. You must use each ship in turn to navigate through several chambers that demonstrate how to grind, weld and drill as well as how to stock a weld ships cargo and how to dock with connectors.
localization.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_6: I used to visit this place at a regular basis during my engineering days and they always had some good deals available. Go see if they are still at it.
localization.Description_Couch: A couch for decorating interiors. Can be used as a seat.
localization.Description_BlockGroup_AutomationGroup: Various blocks responsible for any kind of automation.
localization.IngameHelp_FlyingAShipLGTip_Detail1: One Engineer told me that flying a ship is as easy as riding a bike!
localization.Description_FAQ_Groups: You can use block functions of multiple blocks simultaneously by using block groups. Use Ctrl or Shift to select the ship blocks you wish to put into a group; enter a name in "Block group" on the right side of the screen and press Enter to create the block group.
localization.IngameHelp_Building2_Detail4_Gamepad: Use {CONTROL:BUILD:ROTATE_AXIS_LEFT} and {CONTROL:BUILD:ROTATE_AXIS_RIGHT} to rotate around the axis.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_Enable3rdPersonCame:
Camera can be switched to 3rd person view,
looking on your astronaut from behind
localization.NotificationHintJoystickPressToOpenTermi: Access control menu to open terminal
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsOnlineMode:
Visibility of your game.

Offline: Game runs in offline mode and does not 
require internet connection
Private: Other players cannot join
Friends: Only your {0} friends can join
Public: Any {0} player can join
localization.Description_FAQ_Bug_Q0: How do I report a bug
localization.Quote06Text: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
localization.Description_FAQ_Jetpack: Your jetpack requires hydrogen. You can produce hydrogen from ice in a h2/o2 generator. Refill bottles at the generator or connect the generator with a medical room or survival kit to recharge your hydrogen directly.
localization.Description_RocketLauncher:
The rocket launcher has a limited magazine and is a forward-facing weapon. 

Requires missiles.
localization.ScreenBlueprintsRew_Tooltip_ButRename: Rename blueprint (local/cloud BP only) or script (local script only)
localization.BlockPropertyTitle_Projector_NumberOfPro: The maximum number of projections this projector can build instantly
localization.Notification_NoControlOtherShip: A connected ship has taken control
localization.TerminalTab_Factions_SentJoinToolTip: You are applying for a membership in this faction
localization.IngameHelp_FlyingAShipTip_Detail1: Pilots take no special joy in walking. Pilots like flying. - Neil Armstrong
localization.Description_FAQ_RoomPressure: Room pressure is displayed in a vent menu. A room has to be sealed in order to pressurized.
localization.Description_SolarPanel:
Solar panels generate power when exposed to sunlight.

Point solar panels directly at the sun to improve the amount of power generated.
localization.Contracts_Error_Text_FinishCondition_Inc: Contract could not be finished as selected ship was invalid.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_BreakForce: Landing gear will unlock automatically when force applied to keep it attached is larger than this value
localization.ToolTipOptionsGame_BuildingMode:
Select default block-placement mode
(Affects only building in creative)
localization.TerminalSafeZoneNeedsStation:
Safe zones can be enabled
 only on stations.
localization.Description_FAQ_SpaceCredit: Space Credit is the universal currency used to trade with stations and other players. You can withdraw or deposit space credits from store blocks.
localization.ToolTipCharacterScreen_ShowOnlyDuplicate: Show only items you own more than one time
localization.IngameHelp_Building_Detail4: Select a block or tool by pressing 1 - 9
localization.TerminalTab_Info_PivotBtn_ToolTip: Draw pivot point of each grid
localization.IngameHelp_Rifle_Detail2:Gamepad: *Tip:* There are more specialized rifles available. Don’t forget that you can review useful information anytime in the help screen by accessing the [Help] option in the [Menu] tab of the [System Radial Menu] {CONTROL:SYSTEM_RADIAL_MENU}.
localization.ContractScreen_Hunt_Description_2:
Someone has been causing a lot of trouble lately and we need someone who isn't afraid to deal with it. 
We will relay the target's last known position to you. Go there, find the troublemaker, and take them out.
You will receive the full reward if the contract is completed by means of hand-held weaponry.
localization.ContractScreen_Escort_Description_1:
A nearby transport requested assistance after detecting hostile activity in it's vicinity. 
Go to the transport and make sure it gets through in one piece. 
Your feats will dictate your compensation.
localization.ToolTipJoinGame_Search: Search by entering name of the server
localization.Description_AssemblerBasic:
A basic assembler to produce a limited selection of components. 

Requires ingots and power to produce components.
localization.IngameHelp_InventoryTip_Detail2: *Tip:* You can drag items out of your inventory to drop them again.
localization.Quote03Text: When a distinguished but elderly scientist states that something is possible, he is almost certainly right. When he states that something is impossible, he is very probably wrong.
localization.ContractScreen_Aministration_CreatinResu: Contract creation failed. You are not and owner of targeted block.
localization.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_8: Looking for Reliable contracts? Good trades? Or just making good money? You are in luck! Opportunity awaits at these coordinates!
localization.HintKeyboardOnly04Text:
Did you know? 
    
    
Scrolling while using a camera or turret enables you to zoom in and out.
localization.IngameHelp_Battery_Detail1:
Your base is shaping up!

Now that you have a battery you can start expanding your base even more. Try to find ores to increase your production significantly.
localization.Description_IonThrust: Ion thrusters are advanced thrusters that function best in zero gravity environments.
localization.SharedBlueprintNotify: {0} just shared a blueprint with you.
localization.Quote23Text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
localization.Description_FAQ_RoverMovement: Press {CONTROL:LANDING_GEAR} to disable the brakes and landing gears or {CONTROL:TOGGLE_REACTORS} to turn the power off and on. You can check if there is fuel in your reactors or if your batteries are charged.
localization.IngameHelp_HUDTip_Detail2:Gamepad:
*Tip:* HUD signals can be individually disabled in your terminal control panel.
      *Tip #2:* In creative mode you can also cycle through signals using {CONTROL:TOGGLE_SIGNALS}.
localization.Description_FAQ_Ladder: You can use ladders to traverse vertical spaces. Ladders can be stacked vertically. Press {CONTROL:USE} to interact with a ladder. Hold {CONTROL:FORWARD} or {CONTROL:BACKWARD} to go up and down. Press {CONTROL:JUMP} to get off the ladder.
localization.IngameHelp_Economy_GPSDesc: This is location of the nearest trading station, where you can buy/sell various items.
localization.IngameHelp_OwnershipTip_Detail2:Gamepad: *Tip:* You can configure ownership to share it with friends. Remember, you can find additional information anytime in the help screen by accessing the [Help] option in the [Menu] tab of the [System Radial Menu] {CONTROL:SYSTEM_RADIAL_MENU}.
localization.IngameHelp_HydrogenTip_Detail2: *Tip:* You can conserve hydrogen when in space by flying with dampeners off.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_EnableRemoteBlockRe:
Enable players to remotely remove owned blocks
 to free up their limit
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_Motor_Suspensio:
Limits the suspension's travel height.
Setting to 0% will effectively lock the suspension.
localization.BlockPropertyTooltip_MaxImpulseAxis:
Maximum force the piston is allowed to apply to 
blocking obstacle along it's extending axis.

High values may result in unexpected behaviour.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_Exception_NoMain: Main method not found. Please add Main method into script.
localization.Description_FAQ_AutoPilot: To use autopilot your ship first needs a Remote Control block. You need to add custom GPS waypoints in the Remote Control Block and select a flight mode. You can also set actions to happen when the ship arrives at the next waypoint.
localization.IngameHelp_FlyingAShipLG_Detail2: Use {CONTROL:LANDING_GEAR} to toggle the landing gear.
localization.Description_FAQ_Bug_Q5: Where can I report a bug
localization.BlockPropertiesText_HeadAttachingAny: Looking for any Head to attach
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Trader: If you can build with it, we sell it. If you can shoot with it, we sell that too.
localization.NotificationGridReachedPhysicalLimit: Warning! Grid's number of physical shapes is approaching limit. Further modifications may cause issues with physics.
localization.ScenarioProgressSomeoneWon: Somebody else wins the scenario. Possible winners:
localization.SpectatorControls_Free_Desc: Free spectator. You can still shoot and do actions with controlled object
localization.IngameHelp_IntroTip2_Detail1: *Tip:* You can enable/disable Good.bot ingame help or control hints in Game-Options.
localization.Description_FAQ_CarRover: A rover is a vehicle that uses wheels to move instead of thrusters, which are used to fly. Rovers are usually cheap to build, but often slow and an easy target for other players.
localization.DisplayName_Block_HeavyArmorInvCorner2Ba: Heavy Armor Inv. Corner 2x1x1 Base Smooth
localization.IngameHelp_HelmetVisorTip_Detail2: *Tip:* Always make sure your visor is closed before going into space.  All of this useful information can always be accessed in the help screen by pressing {CONTROL:HELP_SCREEN}.
localization.Description_HandDrill: A tool to break down rock to collect minerals. Hold down Left Mouse Button to drill. Hold Right Mouse Button to quickly dig tunnels.
localization.Quote56Text: No amount of experimentation can ever prove me right; a single experiment can prove me wrong.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_AdaptiveSimulationQ: Enable reduction of quality of deformations and explosions affecting voxels in case CPU is on fire
localization.Quote52Text: To be the first to enter the cosmos, to engage, single-handed, in an unprecedented duel with nature - could one dream of anything more?
localization.Description_FAQ_Tutorial: Play "Learning to Survive" to learn about the basics of Space Engineers. Pay attention to the tooltips for blocks to learn about their functions and I will do my best to help you along the way!
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_FloraDensity: Density of flora elements on planets
localization.TerminalTab_GPS_NewCoord_Name_ToolTip: Name of the GPS entry, that is visible on your HUD
localization.ToolTipOptionsAudio_SpeedBasedSounds:
Play ship engine sounds based solely on the speed of the craft.
Uncheck for realistic sound.
localization.ContractScreen_Repair_Description_0:
Our equipment has sustained serious damage as result of a recent meteor shower and is in need of repairs. 
Go out there and make sure all is back in working order.
localization.Description_Medkit: A medkit is a case containing medical supplies for healing astronaut.
localization.Description_FAQ_HowToPlayGame: Can you be more specific, please?
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_ReplayTool_DeleteRe: Please confirm you wish to delete the stored recordings.
localization.IngameHelp_Grinder_Detail2: Hold {CONTROL:TOOLS:PRIMARY_TOOL_ACTION} to use grinder on any block.
localization.MessageBoxTextRestartNeededAfterRenderer: Applied changes will be visible after restarting the game
localization.Description_FAQ_SpawnShip: Your spawn ship will have everything you need to get started. A survival kit, power and a h2/o2 generator for oxygen and hydrogen. You can take nonesential parts of your ship to use for your new base and scrap it entirely once you no longer need it.
localization.Description_FAQ_CarJump: Your car can use its suspensions to jump to get out of tight spaces. Hold and release X to charge the jump of your car. The strength of the jump is based on your suspensions strength setting.
localization.Description_RemoteControl: Remote controls allow ships to be controlled from a distance when combined with an antenna or commands ships to fly automatically to waypoints.
