localization.Quote31Text: A space engineer is a professional practitioner who uses scientific knowledge, mathematics, physics, astronomy, propulsion technology, materials science, structural analysis, manufacturing and ingenuity to solve practical problems in space.
localization.NotificationHintJoystickPressToOpenContr: Access control menu to open control panel of {0}
localization.HelpScreen_ControllerHint4: You can move through complicated windows more easily with Right Stick.
localization.Description_FAQ_Stone: Stone can be refined into small amounts of basic minerals like Iron, Silicon and Nickel in refineries or a survival kit.
localization.Description_CornerLight: Lights are used to illuminate interiors or can be used to act as reference points on exteriors.
localization.IngameHelp_GrinderTip_Detail2: *Tip:* Grinder's can be used to remove trees.
localization.ChatScreen_TerminalSendMessageDisabled: You cannot send an empty message
localization.Notification_NoControlStation: Someone else is using this station!
localization.ScreenBlueprintsRew_Tooltip_ButOpenInWor: Open already published blueprint/script in {0} Workshop
localization.IngameHelp_Intro_Detail1: Hello, Engineer! My name is Good.bot. I am an AI teacher that helps you by offering directions. Let's get you started! You can access useful information in the help screen.
localization.ToolTipBatteryBlock_Semiauto: Sets to recharge when stored power is 0, sets to discharge when stored power is max.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_PublishScriptDialogTex: Do you want to publish this script?
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_ReplayTool_RemoveCh: Removes the currently active character from the world.
localization.Beacon_SafeZone_ToolTip:
Toggle to turn on safe zone (Grid has to be converted to station for this to work).

Activation time is {0} second{3}. Cost is {1} Zone Chip{4} per {2} minute{5}.
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_ReplayTool_ChangeAs: Change the skin for the currently selected character.
localization.Description_FAQ_Permissions: In multiplayer you need special permissions from an admin to be able to spawn blueprints, edit scripts or teleport. In single player you can turn on space master or change the world mode to creative.
localization.Beacon_SafeZone_AllowConvertToStation_TT: Select to allow converting large grids to stations inside the safe zone.
localization.Description_WindowWall: Transparent windows will keep the air inside and space outside while you enjoy the view in style.
localization.Quote18Text: We see only what we know.
localization.IngameHelp_Ingots_Detail2: Put iron ingot into Assembler inventory.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsViewDistance:
Larger view distances can cause performance issues 
depending on how many objects are in the world.
Large view distances are not recommended on worlds
with high asteroid densities.
localization.ScreenBlueprintsRew_DeleteMessage: Cannot rename blueprint because it is used by another process.
localization.Description_FAQ_ShipInventories: Be sure to connect individual inventories using conveyors. Some items are too large to pass through small conveyor tubes. Press {CONTROL:INVENTORY} to open your personal inventory.
localization.Description_FAQ_Inventory: Your inventory can be accessed by pressing {CONTROL:INVENTORY}. Drag items outside of your inventory screen to drop them. Pick up items by pressing {CONTROL:PICK_UP}.
localization.Description_Warhead:
Warheads are powerful explosives that can be used to destroy asteroids, enemy ships and stations.

Safe when unarmed. They can be detonated manually, by taking damage or set to detonate after a configurable amount of time.
localization.TerminalTab_Info_ConvertButton_TT:
Converts this station to a ship.
Ships can move and rotate.
localization.NotificationJoystickColorFormat: Press {0} to apply color, access control menu to change color
localization.BriefingTutorial06Conveyors: Setting up a good conveyor system is very useful and can save you a lot of time. Learn how to move items through conveyors and the different ways to have separate systems interact or connect with each other.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_Editor_BrowseWorkshop_: Open screen with list of available scripts
localization.ControlScreen_ShareCombobox: Share selected blocks with another player/faction
localization.Description_FAQ_Flashlight: You can toggle your flashlight with {CONTROL:HEADLIGHTS}. Flashlights consume suit power and will not work when depleted.
localization.Terminal_ShowInToolbarConfigToolTip: Show/hide current block in toolbar config
localization.Description_Ejector:
The ejector allows small items to be ejected from small ships. Can also be used to access inventories.

You can use the ejector together with the conveyor sorter to collect and throw out specific items.
localization.Description_FAQ_Visor: Your visor can be opened and closed by pressing {CONTROL:HELMET}. Don't open your visor in space or you will suffocate!
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_Assembler_x10: Assembler requires 10x less materials and is 10x faster
localization.ScreenBlueprintsRew_Tooltip_ButDelete: Delete blueprint (local/cloud BP only) or scripts (local script only)
localization.Description_AngleGrinder: A tool for deconstructing and salvaging. Hold left Mouse Button to grind.
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Trader4: We offer all the essentials for your space industrial advancements and more.
localization.ContractScreen_Find_Description_2: We need someone to pick up a discreet package whose exact position is unknown. Locate this package for us and there will be a reward for you.
localization.IngameHelp_Movement_Detail1: Let's get you started on the basics of movement. Don't forget to stay on the ground.
localization.Quote30Text: Aviation is the branch of engineering that is least forgiving of mistakes.
localization.BriefingTutorial02Inventory: An introduction to player and cargo inventories, how to add/withdraw items and a basic initiation to control panels and terminals for controlling block functions.
localization.QuickstartDX11PleaseRestartGame: Please restart the game to finish switching to DX11
localization.IngameHelp_FlashlightTip_Detail1: A little light goes a long way!
localization.StoreSell_Error_Text_NotEnoughMoney: The owner of this store does not have enough money.
localization.DisplayName_BlueprintClass_LargeBlocks:
Large Blocks
- Click on any Large Block to assemble all components
necessary for it's construction.
localization.Quote34Text: In war times, space engineering involves military engineering as well. Such tasks typically include construction and demolition tasks under combat conditions.
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_ReplayTool_Replay_T: Starts playing back all stored data.
localization.ContractScreen_Aministration_CreatinResu: Contract creation failed due to an error.
localization.TradeScreenPopupAcceptTrade: Do you want to trade with {0}?
localization.StoreBuy_Error_Text_NotEnoughSpaceInTank: Transfer of gas failed. Tank does not have enough free capacity.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_CodeEditor_SaveExit_To: Remembers code inside editor and returns to terminal panel
localization.Description_InteriorPillar: Interior pillars are used to reinforce structures.
localization.Beacon_SafeZone_AllowVoxel_TTIP: Allow/Disallow Voxel modifications in Safe Zone
localization.HintGamepadOnly06Text:
Did you know?
You can change the way GPS coordinates and Antennas are displayed on your HUD through System Radial Menu.
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Builder0: The best choice for reliable ships of industrial grade. We offer the finest quality money can buy.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_InventorySize: Adjust inventory size of your character
localization.Description_FAQ_FlipRover: You can flip your rover by adding pistons and pushing itself up or you can try adding heavy blocks like batteries to your grid, so that it will fall over by changing its center of mass.
localization.ScreenDebugSpawnMenu_AsteroidGenerationC: Generating asteroids can take a long time!
localization.Quote09Text: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
localization.Quote67Text: The laws of science or scientific laws are statements that describe, predict, and perhaps explain why, a range of phenomena behave as they appear to in nature.
localization.QuickstartDX11SwitchQuestion: Please switch to DirectX 11 to play a planet scenario
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsMaxPlayer: Maximum number of players in game
localization.Store_Error_Text_OrderOfferLimitReachedH: Failed to create order/offer. You have reached order/offer limit for this block.
localization.Quote00Text: Scientists discover the world that exists; Engineers create the world that never was.
localization.Description_OpenCockpitLarge: Seat in between lots of consoles. More like a bridge seat.
localization.Quote32Text: Space engineers design materials, structures, and systems while considering the limitations imposed by practicality, regulation, safety, ethicality and cost.
localization.TerminalTab_Factions_JoinToolTip: Send join request to selected faction
localization.MessageBoxTextRecommend:
If you like Space Engineers, you can recommend it to your {0} friends on the following page.
Recommendations help to grow the community. Thank you!
localization.ContractScreen_Administration_SelectionT: Select one of your contract block that will serve as deliver point for package
localization.ContractScreen_Find_Description_3: A client of us listed a reward for the one who can retrieve a lost drop pod in time. A fast vehicle and keen eye is recommended.
localization.DisplayName_InventoryConstraint_Personal: Tools, Weapons, Ammo, and personal items
localization.TerminalControlPanel_EditCode_Tooltip: Opens code editor where you can create new scripts and upload/download them from {0} workshop
localization.Hint18Text:
Did you know?
    
    
Wind turbines are more efficient when placed in high and open spaces.
localization.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_5:
Some Merchant keeps bragging about some really good deals at a station he has been visiting but would not spill the details. 
However, I happened to "stumble" on his navigation computer during my maintenance shift and this position kept popping up. Go see if there is any truth in what that merchant said.
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Miner: No. 1 supplier of high grade minerals and gases. Everything to fuel your industrial advancements.
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Miner3: We offer every raw material the galaxy has to offer. Except water. No one can seem to find water.
localization.Quote05Text: Nothing shocks me. I'm a scientist.
localization.Quote13Text: I have offended God and mankind because my work didn't reach the quality it should have.
localization.Hint05Text:
Did you know?
    
    
Your jet pack can match the velocity of nearby grids using relative dampeners.
localization.LaserAntennaReceiversListHelp:
These receivers are in radio range and can report their position.
Their current state and target is in parenthesis:
idle   laser is idling
>> laser is rotating towards other receiver or GPS coordinates
?>  searching for other laser at requested GPS coordinates
~> contacting other side of link (this includes waiting for other laser
       to turn its face to me or futile effort to contact receiver
       which is turned off or is not there any more)
=> connection is established
To connect to lasers not listed here you can connect to coordinates.
localization.TerminalTab_Factions_PendingPeace: This faction is proposing peace treaty to your faction
localization.StoreBuy_Error_Text_NotEnoughPCU: You don't have enough PCU to buy this item.
localization.Description_FAQ_Script: Scripts might be disabled in world settings.
localization.Description_SpaceBall: A spherical block that reacts to gravity.
localization.ProductionScreen_TerminalControlScreen: Show this assembler in the control panel
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_SensorFieldBack: How far the sensing field extends backwards from the sensor's position
localization.Hint25Text:
Did you know? 
    
    
O2/H2 generator can produce small amounts of hydrogen for thrusters without having a hydrogen tank involved.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_EnableRespawnShips:
Enable respawn in ships and suit. When disabled and no 
valid respawn points exist, respawn won't be possible at all!
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_Motor_MaxSteerA: The maximum angle that the wheel will turn when steering
localization.GameOptions_EnableTrading_TTIP: Enables trading with other players in multiplayer games. If disabled all trade requests are ignored
localization.Description_AdvancedRotor: Advanced rotors enable connected grids to rotate with the ability to transfer items between the grids.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_Motor_Steering: Control steering of this suspension from cockpit
localization.IngameHelp_WheeledVehicles_Detail1: Wheeled Vehicles are cheap to build and require little power.
localization.NewVersionAvailable: New version of Space Engineers is available!
localization.Description_FAQ_Math: Math! I do that all the time!
localization.NotificationPlayerDemoted_Moderator: You have heen demoted to Observer
localization.TerminalControlPanel_RunArgument_ToolTip: An argument passed to your code when clicking the Run button
localization.ContractScreen_Repair_Description_3: A navigation error resulted into a cargo ship colliding with our equipment. Check for damage and repair any that you can find. You will be compensated for the components.
localization.NotificationJumpAbortedStatic: Jump was aborted, the grid is static.
localization.Description_FAQ_Repair: Use your welder to repair damaged blocks. Blocks that have been completely destroyed need to be replaced or you can use a projector to repair faster.
localization.LowMemSwitchToLowQuestion: Your game has ran out of memory last time. Do you want to switch to LOW preset and restart game to apply changes?
localization.NotificationHealthCritical: Warning: Your health is critically low.
localization.IngameHelp_Pod1_Detail1: You start in small drop pod containing the most important accessories. The pod is equipped with an h2/o2 generator to produce hydrogen and oxygen and a survival kit for health and energy.
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_RemoveOwner: Remove inactive owner and his grids
localization.IngameHelp_WheeledVehiclesTip_Detail1: Congratulations! You just passed your driving test!
localization.Description_SmallCargoContainer: Small containers can be used to store items.
localization.Jump_Distance: Distance to the proximity of coordinate:
localization.NotificationSuitEnergyCriticalNoDamage: Warning: Suit energy is critically low.
localization.BlockPropertiesText_MotoLockOverrideDisa:
The current rotor rotation speed is too high.
Rotor will be locked when angular velocity gets lower.
localization.ToolTipTerminalInventory_AddSelectedComp: Add selected component to production queue
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsModeSurvival:
Realistic management of resources, realistic inventory 
capacity, death and respawn
localization.StationRotation_Static_Desc:
Cycles between 3 placement modes:
Local Grid - snap to local coordinate system
Free Placement - rotate and place freely
Gravity-aligned - rotate and place freely, but aligned to gravity
localization.TerminalTab_Info_BlocksTooltip: Total number of blocks in a grid
localization.Contracts_Error_Text_FinishCondition_Mis: Contract could not be finished. You must carry the package in your inventory.
localization.IngameHelp_Battery2_Detail1: You can find ores by looking for dark or bright spots on the ground. Equip your drill to scan for nearby ores or build scouting vehicles with ore detectors to move large amounts of ore to your base.
localization.Terminal_Trading_Tooltip: Trading Mode allows trading through store block. It also prevents the visibility of blocks of other grid, transfer of electricity and items. Cannot be changed while connector is connected.
localization.Description_BlockGroup_TankGroup: Tanks are used to store gases.
localization.Description_RotatingLight: A rotating light to alert engineers of hazardous situations.
localization.Description_FAQ_Mining: You can collect ore by using your drill on voxels like planets or asteroids. Your drill has a short-range detector that shows you the location of ores.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_Editor_HelpTooltip: Opens {0} workshop page with description about in-game programming
localization.Hint01Text:
Did you know?
    
    
You can use /F to chat with your faction only or /g for global.
localization.Description_Refinery:
Advanced refineries refine all ores into ingots.

They can be upgraded with upgrade modules.
localization.Description_FAQ_Factions: Factions are a way to play with other players by sharing your blocks, which can be used by other players. Anyone can set up factions.
localization.Description_FAQ_MergeGrids: You can connect grids with each other with landing gears or connectors. You can merge two grids of the same size type together permanently by using merge blocks or even rotors.
localization.IngameHelp_Building2_Detail1: Most blocks come in two sizes and can be rotated in any direction.
localization.Quote44Text: A pilot who doesn't have any fear probably isn't flying his plane to its maximum.
localization.LoadingError_ModifiedOriginalContent:
Error loading original game content, cannot load file:
{0}

Original game content has been probably modified, revert any modification and try again. Best way to do it is to delete folder 'SpaceEngineers\Content\Data' and then select in {0} 'Verify local game cache'.

Reinstalling the game is not enough, because {0} does not delete unknown files!
localization.IngameHelp_Flashlight_Detail2: Press {CONTROL:HEADLIGHTS} to toggle your flashlight off and on.
localization.Description_Lockers: Personalized lockers for decorating interiors and store your essentials.
localization.ToolTipOptionsDisplay_WindowMode:
Choose whether the game should appear
fullscreen or in a window
localization.IngameHelp_Interactive_Detail4: Press {CONTROL:INVENTORY} to open inventory of highlighted block.
localization.LaserAntennaCopyTargetCoordsHelp: Copy target's current or last known position into clipboard
localization.ToolTipOptionsGraphics_Antialiasing: Smooth out hard edges around objects
localization.IngameHelp_Jetpack2_Detail1: Turning off dampeners while flying allows you to move without slowing down when you let go of the input. This can be useful to move steady at low or high speeds without using much fuel.
localization.BlockPropertyTooltip_ShareTensor:
Equalizes virtual masses of connected grids to 
achieve more stable behaviour
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Builder: Come and browse our selection of the finest ships available to us. We deliver top quality ships made from the highest grade materials.
localization.Description_ProgrammableBlock:
A programmable block is a computer that runs scripts to manage ship systems.

Scripts can be found on the Workshop or written manually.
localization.GUI_Datapad_CreateGPSCoord_TTIP: Press to create gps coordinate marker.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsPermanentDeath:
If true, player loses everything if he dies and has no
available respawn point.
localization.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_3:
Some conflict between two factions left a field of debris and salvager are plucking the fruits by selling their findings to a nearby station that now has their stocks overflowing. 
If you are looking for good deals or work then this is the place to go.
localization.HelpScreen_ControllerHint3: If you make mistake while placing blocks in survival mode you can press {GAMEPAD_CONTROL:BUILD:SECONDARY_TOOL_ACTION} to switch to Grinder tool. When you have Grinder equipped you can press {GAMEPAD_CONTROL:BUILD:SECONDARY_TOOL_ACTION} again to switch to the last equipped block.
localization.NotificationHintSwitchWeaponMode: Press {0} to switch between single/all weapon mode.
localization.Quote46Text: Mars is there, waiting to be reached.
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Trader1: Our partners deliver us the highest quality components, tools, gases and contracts. From the outer regions of space directly to you.
localization.WwwLinkNotAllowed_Steam:
This link is not allowed and will not open.
Allowed sites: {0}community, youtube, KSH forum.
localization.Quote68Text: Scientific laws are strongly supported by empirical evidence - they are scientific knowledge that experiments have repeatedly verified (and never falsified).
localization.ToolTipNewGame_WorkshopContent: Choose one of your subscribed workshop items or browse for more
localization.Description_PowerEfficiencyModule: Power modules decrease power consumption of refineries or assemblers when connected.
localization.Description_FAQ_AirTightnessPressure: A room needs to be airtight before it can be filled with oxygen by an air vent. Make sure there are no holes exposed to space and that all doors are closed.
localization.Description_Rotor: Rotors allows connected grids to rotate.
localization.Terminal_ShowInInventoryToolTip: Show block in inventory screen. If you access the block directly it will be visible regardless of this setting.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_BlocksInventorySize: Adjust inventory size of the blocks
localization.NotificationBuildPlannerEmpty: Build Planner is empty. Open Toolbar screen {0}  to add some items to Build Planner.
localization.Description_LandingGear:
Landing gears are capable of magnetically locking to any surface.

Landing gears can be locked and unlocked by pressing {CONTROL:LANDING_GEAR} when inside a cockpit. They will show up yellow when in range of a surface that they can lock onto.
localization.HelpScreen_ControllerHint7: Emotes toolbar is predefined and cannot be changed.
localization.Description_WindowWallRight: Transparent windows will keep the air inside and space outside while you enjoy the view in style.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_Connector_Stren: Connector strength when aligning ship (yellow color), smaller strength of two connectors is used
localization.IngameHelp_Camera_Detail2: Toggle {CONTROL:CAMERA_MODE} to switch between first and third person view.
localization.Description_FAQ_IndustrialCockpit: The industrial cockpit is a sturdy decorative cockpit for large and small grids that features a large field of vision. This cockpit is usefull for rovers and ships that need to work close to surfaces or other grids without damaging them.
localization.ChatBotMisunderstanding0: Apologies, I am unable to answer the question. I am still learning. For more help, please visit https://support.keenswh.com/
localization.Contracts_Error_Text_NoAccess: You don't have access to this block.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsMaxBlocksPerPlayer:
Maximum number of blocks each player can build. 
Destroyed blocks are refunded.
localization.GuiTriggerPasteBlocksTooltip: Adds blocks copied through button at the end of block terminal screen.
localization.Description_MergeBlock:
Merge blocks can be used to permanently or temporarily connect two grids together and function as one grid.

Merge blocks will show up yellow when in range of another merge block.
localization.TerminalTab_Info_Description:
Building a grid partially inside of terrain automatically turns the grid into a station.
Stations are more performance friendly but are static and cannot be moved.

You can convert any station into a ship. Be careful that it's not embedded in any terrain as it might explode.

A ship needs to be stationary in order to convert it into a station.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_Exception_TooComplex: Script execution terminated, script is too complex. Please edit and rebuild script.
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_ReplayTool_StopReco: Stops recording for the currently selected character.
localization.Description_BlockGroup_DecorativeUtility: Various utility blocks for decorative purposes.
localization.Description_FAQ_Time: It is time for Space Engineers!
localization.ContractScreen_ObtainDeliver_Description:
We have several buyers interested in products not currently available to us. 
Help find these products and you will receive a sizeable cut.
localization.Description_Decoy: Decoy's draw fire from enemy AI controlled turrets to distract them from more important targets.
localization.ReputationBat_Tooltip_Neutral:
Neutral relation
From {0} to {1} reputation.
Able to interact.
localization.Description_FAQ_UnknownSignals: Signals indicate positions of pods where you can obtain loot and skins in survival mode. Weak signals are only visible for you. Stronger signals are visible for everyone on the server but may lead to better loot.
localization.BlockPropertiesText_MotorAttachingAny: Looking for any rotor to attach
localization.ContractScreen_Hunt_Description_0:
With the absence of organized law enforcement the responsibility falls to individual factions to make sure that criminals do not go unpunished.
With that said, we have received reports of the location of one such culprit and we need you to make an example of them, so that others are not tempted down the same path. 
Find and take the target down. Use hand-held weapons or tools for the full reward. You will be kept up to date of the latest reported position of your target.
localization.HintGamepadOnly02Text:
Did you know? 
If you make mistake while placing blocks in survival mode you can press {0} to switch to Grinder tool. When you have Grinder equipped you can press {0} to switch to the last equipped block.
localization.Description_FAQ_GPSSignals: GPS signals can be disabled or created in the Coms tab. Double-click a GPS signal to disable it. GPS signals can be stored in LCD panels or broadcasted in chat. Be careful not to attract enemies.
localization.Description_VendingMachine: Allows displaying and selling of items.
localization.ToolTipVideoOptionsRenderer: Changing the renderer requires restart of the game
localization.ToolTipJoinGame_DirectConnect: Connect to a server via IP
localization.Description_FAQ_Ingots: Ingots are produced in refineries from ores and are essential to produce components.
localization.Description_FAQ_StylePack: The Style Pack ads more player skins, armor skins and emotes for you to use in game.
localization.ScreenMedicals_ActivateSpectator: Press Shift + Escape to enable spectator mode.
localization.ControlScreen_ShareComboboxDisabled:
You need to be owner of the block
to access it's sharing options
localization.Quote59Text: The flow of heat is a form of energy transfer. In other words, a quantity of heat that flows from a hot body to a cold one can be expressed as an amount of energy being transferred from the hot body to the cold one.
localization.Economy_Contract_FinishTooltip_NotAFinis: This contract cannot be finished at this station.
localization.DisplayName_BlueprintClass_SmallBlocks:
Small Blocks
- Click on any Small Block to assemble all components
necessary for it's construction.
localization.Notification_PlanetsNotSupported: Planets are not supported on this platform
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_EnableOxygenPressur: Allow pressurization of ships and stations
localization.Contracts_Error_Text_ActivationCondition: You do not meet requirements to accept this contract. You are the target.
localization.IngameHelp_Power_Detail1:
Blocks or entire grids can be turned off to save power and fuel. 
When you are in a cockpit, Press {CONTROL:TOGGLE_REACTORS} to turn off and on the power production blocks.
localization.Description_MissileTurret:
Missile turrets are configurable automated turrets that target anything hostile within its range.

Requires missiles. Can be controlled manually from a cockpit. Use conveyors to allow automatic reloading.
localization.IngameHelp_HealthTip_Detail2: *Tip:* You will also slowly heal in oxygenated environments.
localization.IngameHelp_HelmetVisor_Detail1: Your helmet visor is still open! Close it to avoid taking damage in low oxygen environments.
localization.Description_Wheel: Wheels can be used to traverse terrain in environments with gravity.
localization.ContractScreen_ObtainDeliver_Description:
As a result of a miscommunication with a distributor we find ourselves short on some supplies.
Find us these supplies, bring them here and you will be compensated for your services.
localization.Description_ConveyorTube: Use conveyor tubes and junctions to connect inventories of blocks so that items can move freely from one inventory to another.
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Builder3: Cutting edge technologies bring you the best quality through our shipyards, delivering competitive advantage to you over your competitors.
localization.Description_Rifle: A simple weapon to protect yourself.
localization.ContractScreen_Hunt_Description_1:
It seems like someone has made a bit of a name for themselves at the expense of others and in doing so made some of our clients quite unhappy. 
We just received reports detailing this person's last known position. We will happily compensate you if you can track them down and take them out. 
To ensure proper identification of your target we would prefer you take them down with either weapons or hand tools, if you prefer. You will be more highly rewarded for doing so.
We will make sure you are updated with the last known location of the target. Are you up to the job?
localization.IngameHelp_Building2_Detail3: Use {CONTROL:CUBE_ROTATE_ROLL_POSITIVE}, {CONTROL:CUBE_ROTATE_VERTICAL_NEGATIVE}, {CONTROL:CUBE_ROTATE_HORISONTAL_POSITIVE}, {CONTROL:CUBE_ROTATE_HORISONTAL_NEGATIVE}, {CONTROL:CUBE_ROTATE_ROLL_NEGATIVE} and {CONTROL:CUBE_ROTATE_VERTICAL_POSITIVE} keys to rotate blocks.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsSupergridding: Allows supergridding exploit to be used
localization.NotificationPlayerPromoted_Scripter: You have been promoted to Scripter
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_EnableOxygen: Enable oxygen processing. Used by space suit and cockpits
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_ReplicateEverything: You are on server and allready have all objects
localization.IngameHelp_HUD_Detail3:Gamepad: Press {CONTROL:SYSTEM_RADIAL_MENU} navigate to the [View] tab and select the [Signals] option to cycle through signal states.
localization.IngameHelp_InteractiveTip_Detail1: These skills will serve you well!
localization.NotificationProjectorMultipleGrids: Multiple grids are not supported. Only the largest grid will be used.
localization.Description_DeskCorner: A desk for decorating interiors. Can be used as a seat.
localization.Description_GatlingGun:
Gatling guns are static weapons that require ammunition to function.

Set the Gatling gun on your ship toolbar to use this weapon. Connect the Gatling gun with conveyors so it can pull ammunition from other inventories automatically. Use a camera to zoom in on distant targets.
localization.Description_JumpDrive:
Jump drives allow ships to teleport over large distances.

They require a full charge to jump and can only be activated from the toolbar of a cockpit.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_MotorRotorDispl: Allows to move the rotor grid up or down to solve various alignment issues
localization.Quote65Text: SCIENTIFIC METHOD: principles and procedures for the systematic pursuit of knowledge involving the recognition and formulation of a problem, the collection of data through observation and experiment, and the formulation and testing of hypotheses.
localization.NotificationJumpAbortedLocked: Jump was aborted, the grid is locked.
localization.Antenna_HudTextToolTip: The text to display on the HUD when the antenna is enabled. Leave empty to display the block name.
localization.ScreenMedicals_RespawnWhenShipReady: Will spawn on "{0}" when it is ready.
localization.Quote61Text: An object that is at rest will stay at rest unless an external force acts upon it.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_EnablePlanets: Enable/disable spawning of planets in world
localization.Description_Sound: Sound blocks emit sounds when activated.
localization.Hint02Text:
Did you know?
    
    
Wheel suspensions use power based on their power setting.
localization.Description_FAQ_Tools: A welder to construct blocks, a grinder to deconstruct blocks and a drill to find ore and dig tunnels. All tools can be produced in assemblers or survival kits from basic materials.
localization.ToolTipOptionsGraphics_PostProcessing: Enables Bloom, Vignette, Chromatic Aberation and washes the visor up
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_Motor_Friction: Regulates wheel friction by changing pressure in the tire
localization.Description_CornerCouch: A couch for decorating interior corners. Can be used as a seat.
localization.Quote41Text: If you see a bomb technician running, follow him.
localization.Quote25Text: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
localization.Contracts_Error_Text_Activation: Contract cannot be accepted because it has been deleted or already accepted by someone else.
localization.Contracts_Accepted_Text:
By accepting this contract you are bound to fulfill all conditions of this contract in timely manner.
Failing to do so may lead to negative feedback and loss of assets.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_LightOffset: Offset of the light from model
localization.Hint11Text: Be careful using your jetpack on planets.  Your hydrogen fuel will run out quickly.
localization.Description_FAQ_Broadcasting: Your suit has a limited range antenna for accessing grids remotely or controlling drones. You can turn it off and on with O.
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_RemoveOwnerToolTip: Remove inactive owner and all his grids, remove him from checkpoint too. Owner must be offline, or kicked/banned first
localization.Description_FAQ_Marek: Marek Rosa is the Founder and CEO of Keen Software House and GoodAI.
localization.Description_FAQ_Objective: Space Engineers is a sandbox game. You can set your own goals. Search the workshop for scenarios and missions or create your own to play together with friends! Active mission objectives are displayed in the top left corner.
localization.Description_FAQ_Navigation: You can create GPS signals to store important locations and waypoints. Use an antenna or beacon to broadcast positions of grids, but be careful, as others can also see these marked locations. Use /GPS to quickly save your current location.
localization.SafeZone_Color_TTP: Changes color of the safe zone sphere.
localization.DisplayName_BlueprintClass_Components:
Components
- Click on any component to assemble it.
localization.BlockPropertiesText_MotorAttachingSpecif: Looking for specific rotor to attach
localization.Description_FAQ_Grinding: You can use a grinder to grind down blocks and deconstruct them. Components are salvaged and transferred into your inventory while grinding.
localization.NotificationHintOpenShipControlPanel: Press {0} to open ship control panel
localization.BlockActionTooltip_WaypointReset: Resets current waypoint to first position
localization.MessageBoxTextRestartNeededAfterLanguage: Some texts might need game restart to be reloaded.
localization.Quote15Text: By denying scientific principles, one may maintain any paradox.
localization.ToolbarConfig_ResearchTabDisabledTooltip: Progression is currently disabled, you can enable it in the advanced world settings.
localization.Quote54Text: The dreams of yesterday are the hopes of today and the reality of tomorrow.
localization.Description_FAQ_CopyPaste: You can copy, paste and delete blocks and grids only in creative mode by pressing Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V and Ctrl-X.
localization.Description_FAQ_Trading: You can trade with players and stations using Store blocks. Trading with players can be done directly by pressing F3.
localization.IngameHelp_Oxygen_Detail1: Your oxygen is getting low. Oxygen is produced from ice in a h2/o2 generator. You can refill bottles at the generator or resupply directly by interacting with a medical bay or survival kit if it's connected with the h2/o2 generator.
localization.IngameHelp_Rifle_Detail2: *Tip:* There are more specialized rifles available. Don’t forget that you can review useful information anytime in the help screen by pressing {CONTROL:HELP_SCREEN}.
localization.Description_FAQ_Hydrogen: Hydrogen is a fuel used for your suit's jetpack and hydrogen thrusters. Hydrogen is produced from ice in a h2/o2 generator. You can story hydrogen in hydrogen tanks and bottles.
localization.IngameHelp_Interactive_Detail2: Press {CONTROL:USE} to activate a highlighted block.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_AnyoneCanUse: If false checks whether player pressing button has access to the block
localization.SurvivalKit_SpawnNameToolTip: The name to display on the spawn screen. Leave empty to display the block name.
localization.IngameHelp_Jetpack_Detail4: Use {CONTROL:FORWARD} {CONTROL:BACKWARD} {CONTROL:STRAFE_LEFT} {CONTROL:STRAFE_RIGHT} keys to move and strafe.
localization.StoreBuy_Error_Text_NotEnoughAmount: There is not enough amount of the item.
localization.StoreSell_Error_Text_NotEnoughAmount: You don't have specified amount of that item.
localization.IngameHelp_Turbine_Detail1: A solar panel or wind turbine under the right conditions will be able to provide enough energy for you to get started. Continue by adding a basic assembler or deconstruct your old survival kit and move it over to your new base.
localization.ToolTipTerminalInventory_ShowInteracted: Show inventory of interacted item (or corpse)
localization.ContractScreen_Aministration_FailText_Is: Item amount has invalid value. Must be positive number.
localization.Description_ToiletSeat: A toilet for decorating interiors. Can be used as a seat.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_Assembler_x3: Assembler requires 3x less materials and is 3x faster
localization.NotificationShipEnergyCriticalNoDamage: Warning: Ship fuel is critically low.
localization.Description_VirtualMass: Artificial mass or spaceballs enable grids to react to artificial gravity.
localization.IngameHelp_Building_Detail1: You can build blocks anywhere in the world or add them to existing grids. The toolbar config screen will show you all available blocks that you can build.
localization.Description_FAQ_ShipWontFly: Does your ship have enough power? Does it have enough thrusters? Are your dampeners turned on?
localization.Quote37Text: The word engineer is derived from the Latin roots 'ingeniare' ("to contrive, devise") and 'ingenium' ("cleverness").
localization.BuildPlanner_Description: Build Planner helps you to manage required components for your build. It also helps you with grabbing them from inventories or queueing for production.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_StartInRespawnScree:
When played as scenario: player will start in 
respawn screen with new identity, all ownership 
will be lost
localization.IngameHelp_OxygenTip_Detail2: *Tip:* Walking consumes less oxygen than running or sprinting
localization.IngameHelp_Ingots_Detail3: Use a survival kit or Assembler to produce and obtain steel plates.
localization.MedicalRoom_ownershipAssignmentTooltip: Medical room's owner will be set to anyone who spawns in it as long as former ownership is set to nobody
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsDifficulty:
The damage given and taken to and from enemies
and environment. Higher difficulty means more 
realistic damage.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_Exception_Ownershipcha: Ownership of programmable block changed. Please recompile program.
localization.Description_PistonTop: This piston part is the top section of the piston.
localization.Description_OreDetector: Ore detectors detect ores within a limited radius and makes them show up on your HUD.
localization.StoreBuy_Error_Text_ItemsTimeout: Store list was updated, because it was not up to date.
localization.ToolTipJoinGameServerSearch_CompatibleVe: Show only servers with compatible version
localization.HintKeyboardOnly07Text: Double clicking items will automatically transfer the whole stack between inventories.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsSoundMode: Switches between realistic and arcade sounds
localization.SwitchToNormalVT: With this release we changed visuals of the game a lot. Your graphics settings were changed to Medium to avoid any performance issues.
localization.TerminalTab_Factions_SentPeace: You are proposing peace treaty to this faction
localization.Description_ButtonPanel:
Button panels enable you to bind block functions to buttons that can be directly interacted with.

When highlighted, press {CONTROL:TERMINAL} to configure the buttons and {CONTROL:USE} to activate them.
localization.TerminalTab_Info_OwnedAntennaRange_ToolT:
Maximum range at which owned
antennas can be displayed on HUD
localization.ProgrammableBlock_Exception_NotAllowed: In-game scripts are disabled for this world
localization.ContractScreen_Aministration_FailText_It: Item type for delivery must be selected.
localization.Description_FAQ_Electricity: Electricity can be produced through reactors or solar panels and stored in batteries. It is transferred automatically through all connected blocks. Many blocks require electricity to function.
localization.IngameHelp_Datapad_Desc: I can see you have a datapad in your inventory. Datapad can hold important information you wish to store there. For example, datapad bought on stations contain coordinates of other stations.
localization.Description_LockerRoomCorner: A locker to store tools, weapons, ammunition and bottles.
localization.Description_HeavyArmor: Heavy armor to give structure and shape to ships and stations. Durable but heavy.
localization.ToolTipNewWorldQuickstart:
Create a new world using the default settings:
Game Type: Creative Mode
Scenario: Planet / Easy Start 1
Auto-Save: ON
localization.Beacon_SafeZone_AllowLandingGear_TTIP: Select to allow landing gear locking inside the safe zone
localization.TerminalTab_Factions_JoinLimitsExceeded: Cannot join this faction because it will exceed faction block limits!
localization.MedicalRoom_factionAssignmentTooltip: Respawned player will be assigned to this medical room's faction
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_LightBlinkOffse: Offset of blinking as percentage of blink interval
localization.Description_LargeCargoContainer: Large containers can be used to store many items.
localization.NotificationStationRotation: Station rotation mode, press {0} to switch off
localization.Quote42Text: The only time you have too much fuel is when you're on fire.
localization.Description_OxygenFarm:
Hydroponics farms produce small amounts of oxygen when in contact with sunlight.

Use an oxygen tank to store oxygen.
localization.ChatBot_Rude: That was not very nice! In case of any issues, please contact us at https://support.keenswh.com/
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_LightRadius: Radius of influence of the light
localization.ToolTipOptionsAudio_SoundVolume: Configure volume level of sound effects
localization.StoreBuy_Error_Text_NotEnoughStoreBlockI: There is not enough space in the store block inventory to complete transaction.
localization.GuiTriggerNextMissionTooltip:
You can put a scenario name here (must already exist on local computer to be loaded) 
or workshop ID number (user does *not* have to have it subscribed in that case).
Workshop ID can be seen in the URL link of scenario in question on {0} workshop web.
localization.ContractScreen_Aministration_CreatinResu: Contract creation failed. You have reached limit amount of contracts for this block.
localization.Contracts_Error_Text_Activationcondition: You do not meet requirements to accept this contract.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_Connector_AutoU: Time (in seconds) after which connector automatically unlocks.
localization.ScreenBlueprintsRew_NoWorkshopBlueprints: There are no subscribed Workshop blueprints. You can visit {0} Workshop and download them here:
localization.BlockActionTooltip_AddWheel: Tries to add a Wheel if no wheel is present
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_SensorFieldLeft: How far the sensing field extends to the left from the sensor's position
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_ReplayTool_ReloadWo: You cannot reload the world if you are not the host.
localization.Quote63Text: The acceleration of a body is directly proportional to, and in the same direction as, the net force acting on the body, and inversely proportional to its mass.
localization.Description_FAQ_StoreBlock: You can use a store block to trade with players or other factions. Trading can be done from ship inventories when using connectors with trade functions enabled.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_GravityFieldDep: Depth of the gravity field of the generator
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_ReplayTool_AddChara: Adds a new controllable character to the world.
localization.NotificationHintPressToOpenControlPanel: Press {0} to open control panel of {1}
localization.AddNpcToFactionHelp:
Adds new NPC identity to this faction - faction will not cease to exist when last player leaves.
Available in scenario edit mode only.
localization.IngameHelp_Camera_Detail3:Gamepad: Use {CONTROL:CAMERA_ZOOM_IN} and {CONTROL:CAMERA_ZOOM_OUT} to adjust the distance of third person view.
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Builder4: Number one producer of vehicles for industrial, military, mining and exploration aplications.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_LightReflectorR: Reflector radius of influence of the light
localization.TerminalTab_Chat_NoFaction: Only faction members can use faction-to-faction communications
localization.NotificationPlayerDemoted_SpaceMaster: You have been demoted to Space Master
localization.DisplayName_BlueprintClass_BasicComponen:
Basic Ingots and Components
- Click on any ingot or component to assemble it.
localization.ScreenMedicals_NoRespawnPossible:
No respawn point is available! 
Try the refresh button for any available respawn points.
If there is no chance of accessing them, the game is over and you can leave the game.
localization.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_0:
I happen to know a guy who knows a guy with some good deals. The real quality stuff you know? 
But it doesn't look like I will be getting anywhere near this place to profit from these deals so I will sell you the data if you are interested.
localization.Description_FAQ_SaveBlueprints: You can save ship designs in blueprints by aiming at them and press Ctrl-B. Press F10 to open your menu of blueprints.
localization.TerminalTab_Info_EnemyAntennaRange_ToolT:
Maximum range at which enemy
antennas can be displayed on HUD
localization.Description_Battery: A battery stores power and is able to distribute a high output of energy.
localization.IngameHelp_WheeledVehicles2_Detail1: You can adjust wheel settings individually to control steering angles, acceleration, maximum speed and much more. They can “jump” by charging their suspension to get out of gaps.
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Trader2: We deliver durable components and the best quality tools. Our services include fuel, oxygen and contracts from reliable partners.
localization.ToolTipOptionsGraphics_ShaderQuality:
Select quality of render effects.
Higher settings may affect performance.
localization.ScenarioProgressNoSpawn: Spend more than {0} seconds in respawn screen.
localization.ToolTipFlaresIntensity: Intensity multiplier for all lens flares
localization.Quote33Text: Space engineers are grounded in applied sciences, and their work in research and development is distinct from the basic research focus of space scientists.
localization.TerminalTab_Info_FriendlyAntennaRange_To:
Maximum range at which friendly
antennas can be displayed on HUD
localization.Description_Powerkit: A powerkit is a portable battery pack for recharging suit of an astronaut.
localization.Description_FAQ_Damage: Damage can be inflicted by using weapons like missile launchers or gatling turrets or hand held rifles. Grids can also be damaged by impacts with other grids or voxels.
localization.NotEnoughMaterial: Not enough materials to create a new block. At least one steel plate is required.
localization.ScreenTerminalError_NoAssemblers: There are no assemblers on this ship.
localization.Description_FAQ_Uranium: Uranium is a rare material only found in asteroids and moons. There is no uranium on planets.
localization.IngameHelp_MagneticBoots_Detail1: In zero gravity you can use your magnetic boots to walk on any surface. Position yourself with your feet down and turn off your jetpack to automatically lock your magnetic boots.
localization.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_4: There is plenty of work available if you know where to look. You should investigate this place, I heard there is a shortage on couriers.
localization.NotificationCopyPasteAsteroidObstructed: Can not place asteroids/voxels over ships(except stations), players, or out of world bounds
localization.IngameHelp_Jetpack2_Detail2:Gamepad: Swith between dampener modes with {CONTROL:DAMPING} while flying.
localization.Trash_KickAFKWarning: Please note: If you remain inactive for 1 minute you will be disconnected.
localization.Description_WindTurbine: The Wind turbine generates low amounts of power when exposed to open areas. Only works on planets with atmosphere.
localization.ContractScreen_Repair_Description_4: We would like to recommission some of our equipment but it is in no functional condition right now. Check out what is missing or damaged, fix it and you will be paid for the components.
localization.Description_GratedStairs: Stairs can be used to create safe walkways throughout your creations.
localization.Description_TextPanel: LCD panels display pictograms or customized text.
localization.Description_FAQ_Pushing: Player characters can push small grids by walking or flying into them if these grids aren't too heavy. If you want to push or pull heavy objects you will have to build a ship or rover and grab the object with landing gear.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsModeCreative: Unlimited resources, instant building, no death
localization.ToolTipOptionsGraphics_FOV: Adjust view cone of character camera in degrees
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_IgnorePcuTip: When enabled, you will completely ignore all PCU limits. This may cause you to go into negative PCUs.
localization.Quote57Text: Science never solves a problem without creating ten more.
localization.BlockActionTooltip_AddSmallRotorHead: Tries to add a Small Rotor head on Large Rotor if no head is present
localization.Parachute_AutoDeployTooltip: Parachute will auto deploy at auto deploy height if descending to the ground
localization.Description_FAQ_Decoratives: Decorative blocks allow players to decorate the interiors of large grid ships. Blocks such as the desk and kitchen are modular and can be combined together to create many shapes.
localization.Description_OxygenTank:
Oxygen tank store oxygen.

Able to store and refill oxygen bottles. Use h2/o2 generator to produce oxygen.
localization.ScreenBlueprintsRew_Tooltip_ButEdit: Open tab for editing blueprint/script information
localization.MessageBoxTextWorkshopDownloadFailed: Download failed, please try again later.
localization.Contracts_Error_Text_ActivationCondition: You cannot accept this contract as target is currently not online.
localization.Hint00Text:
Did you know? 
    
    
You can build blocks from any cockpit by pressing Ctrl-G.
localization.IngameHelp_Components_Detail1: Components are used to build and repair blocks. You can use a welder on any block to add the required component. You can select tools and blocks on your toolbar.
localization.IngameHelp_HandDrill_Detail1: A hand drill is used to break down rock, collect minerals or to dig tunnels. Ores can be found in asteroids and dark spots on planets. All drills are equipped with a short-range detector.
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Trader3: Components, Munitions, Tools, and Fuel. You name it. Become a partner for the best offers, we will make it worth your while.
localization.ContractScreen_Find_Description_0: A container got lost during transit and a client of ours is eager to see it returned. Go to it's last known location and find this container.
localization.Description_TransparentLCD: Transparent LCD panels display pictograms, scripts or customized text.
localization.ProductionScreen_TerminalInventoryScreen: Show this assembler in the inventory screen
localization.HintKeyboardOnly05Text:
Did you know? 
    
    
You can dig tunnels quickly without producing ore by using right mouse function with your drill.
localization.ToolTipOptionsGraphics_AmbientOcclusion: Darken the areas that are less exposed to the ambient light
localization.Description_BlockGroup_SeatsGroup: Various seats and beds for character.
localization.Quote69Text: Every point mass in the universe attracts every other point mass with a force that is directly proportional to the product of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between them.
localization.IngameHelp_BuildingTip2_Detail2: *Tip:* Always make sure you keep a few components with you.
localization.ToolTipOptionsAudio_VoiceChatVolume: Configure volume level of player voice chat
localization.Contracts_Error_Text_FinishCondition_Not: Contract could not be finished. Selected ship does not contain enough items.
localization.ChatBotUnavailable: I am sorry, I'm not available right now. Please visit https://support.keenswh.com/ or try again later.
localization.TerminalTab_Factions_FriendToolTip: Propose peace treaty to selected faction
localization.MessageBoxTextTutorialQuestion: Do you want to see basic tutorial video?
localization.ProgrammableBlock_SaveChanges: Do you want to remember changes ?
localization.ToolTipCharacterScreen_HideDuplicates:
Show only one item in case you own
multiple items of the same type
localization.IngameHelp_HUD_Detail2:Gamepad: Press {CONTROL:SYSTEM_RADIAL_MENU} navigate to the [Quick Actions] tab and select the [Toggle HUD] option to cycle through HUD states.
localization.IngameHelp_MagneticBoots_Detail2: Use your magnetic boots in zero gravity.
localization.Contracts_AbandonConfirmation_Text: By abandoning this contract you will lose all collateral you have paid and you may lose some reputation in process.
localization.Description_GratedHalfStairs: Stairs can be used to create safe walkways throughout your creations.
localization.Description_FAQ_Bottles: Hydrogen and oxygen bottles can be produced in assemblers and refilled in h2/o2 generators.
localization.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_2:
So you are looking for more jobs or trade? Sure we can sort you out. 
Take a look at this place. It is a bit remote but rumor goes that pilots find good opportunities here.
localization.WelcomeScreen_Text1: I would first like to personally thank you for choosing to support our game and its development. Many talented people been involved in this project during the last six years and we are honoured to have you join our community.
localization.HintGamepadOnly10Text:
Did you know? 
You can modify voxels with Voxel Hand Tool, which can be accesed from System Radial Menu in Creative Mode. You can then place, remove, revert and paint voxels with {0}, {1}, {2}+{0} and {2}+{1} respectively.
localization.Terminal_ShowOnHUDToolTip: You must have active antenna connected
localization.Description_FAQ_NPCShip: There are cargo ships that travel the world around you. Coming near them can be dangerous as they consider you a threat.
localization.Hint06Text: A few well placed decoy blocks can make the difference between a victory and a loss.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_GyroOverride: If set, the gyro does not respond to cockpit controls, but can instead be controlled manually using the terminal control sliders
localization.Quote07Text: A new scientific truth does not triumph by convincing its opponents and making them see the light, but rather because its opponents eventually die, and a new generation grows up that is familiar with it.
localization.Description_SurvivalKit: All in one factory to get a space engineer started, but it has limited refining and assembling capabilities. Allows the player to recharge.
localization.Quote20Text: Only one thing is certain - that is, nothing is certain. If this statement is true, it is also false.
localization.ToolTipOptionsGame_GDPRConsent:
By checking this you agree to our privacy policy according to GDPR.

You can change your mind at any time.
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_MotorLock: Rotor will lock its current position
localization.Hint08Text:
Did you know? 
    
    
Dark spots on planets indicate ore deposits.
localization.Description_Datapad: A datapad is an electronic device used to store and display information.
localization.IngameHelp_OxygenTip_Detail1: Breathing is preferable to not breathing!
localization.Hint07Text:
Did you know? 
    
    
Meteor impact craters can leave valuable resources.
localization.Description_FAQ_SpectatorMode: You can access Spectator mode by pressing F8 to move around your camera freely and F7 to remain in the spectator camera while controlling your character. Spectator mode requires permissions and has to enabled in worlds settings.
localization.Oxygen_Disabled: Oxygen or Airtightness disabled in world settings!
localization.ContractScreen_Deliver_Description_2:
We are looking for skilled couriers capable of handling jobs within a tight schedule. 
We require a mandatory collateral upon accepting this contract. You will be reimbursed and rewarded upon completing the contract but failing to do so will forfeit the collateral. 
Time is key, are you up for it?
localization.ProgrammableBlock_ReplaceScriptNameUsed: Cannot rename script because it is used by another process.
localization.IngameHelp_OwnershipTip_Detail1: To hack or not to hack? That is the real question!
localization.EconomyFaction_Description_Builder1: Top manufacturer of ships for the best prices. We offer excellent service that fit your needs.
localization.StoreSell_Error_Text_NotEnoughInventoryS: There is not enough space in store's grid inventories.
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_IgnoreSafeZonesTip:
When enabled you will be completely immune to the effects of safezone.
WARNING: This affects only your characters. Grids will still be affected.
localization.StoreBuy_Error_Text_WrongOfferPricePerUn: Price per unit is lower than minimum. Minimum is {0}.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsResetOwnership: Reset owners of all blocks to nobody
localization.Quote50Text: To go places and do things that have never been done before - that's what living is all about.
localization.Parachute_DeployHeightTooltip: Height that the parachute will automatically deploy if auto deploy is On
localization.Description_FAQ_Oxygen: Some planets have breathable atmospheres. Oxygen can be produced from ice with a h2/o2 generator or from an oxygen farm. Oxygen can be stored in oxygen tanks and bottles.
localization.Description_RefineryBasic: Basic refineries refines limited types of ores into ingots.
localization.BlockPropertiesTitle_HudText_Tooltip: The text to display on the HUD when the beacon is enabled. Leave empty to display the block name.
localization.IngameHelp_Camera_Detail3: Use [ALT + Mouse Wheel] to adjust the distance of third person view.
localization.Description_FAQ_SteamWorkshop: The {0} workshop is where you can find all player made blueprints, scenarios, scripts and mods that players published. Subscribe to workshop items to access them in game.
localization.Description_Projector:
The projector block projects saved blueprints of ships so that they can be built easily.

Projection requires a connection with a grid from a projector in order to start construction.
localization.Hint04Text:
Stuck? 
    
    
Pressing {0} enables you to respawn.
localization.Quote14Text: All our knowledge has its origins in our perceptions.
localization.Description_Stairs: Stairs can be used to traverse heights.
localization.Quote47Text: This is one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind.
localization.DisplayName_Block_HeavyArmorInvCorner2Ti: Heavy Armor Inv. Corner 2x1x1 Tip Smooth
localization.ContractScreen_Find_Description_1: Due to a navigational error a cargo capsule was misdelivered and we only know it's rough whereabouts. We need someone capable of finding it before someone else does. Are you up for it?
localization.Description_FAQ_Welding: Use your welder on blocks to build and repair. Welding requires power drawn from your suit and components for the block. You can also install welders on ships. Use RMB to add missing components from the block you are looking at to your build planner.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsAutorespawn: Enable/Distable automatic respawn at nearest available respawn point
localization.BlockPropertyDescription_GravityFieldHei: Height of the gravity field of the generator
localization.HintKeyboardOnly08Text: While holding a blueprint in creative mode, you can use B to align them to a planet's Gravity.
localization.ToolTipJoinGameServerSearch_SameGameData: Show only servers with same game data
localization.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_KeepOriginalOwnersh: When grid is pasted keep original ownership and authorship.
localization.Description_Ramp: The ramp block can be used to traverse heights or simply used for aesthetics.
localization.Notification_NoControl: Someone else is using this ship!
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsRemoveTrash:
If checked, ships that are considered to be trash will be 
removed to make the game run faster. To be considered 
trash, the grid has to contain just a few blocks, be in uniform 
linear motion, be unpowered, uncontrolled, without a 
medbay and far enough from all players so that they can barely
see it.
localization.Description_FAQ_MetalScrap: Metal scrap appears when blocks are violently destroyed and can be melted back into iron ingots by putting them into a refinery.
localization.Description_OxygenGenerator:
h2/o2 generators produce oxygen and hydrogen from ice.

Use oxygen and hydrogen tanks for storage. Will refill bottles automatically.
localization.Description_FAQ_Thing: Have you tried that other thing?
localization.IngameHelp_ComponentsTip_Detail2: *Tip:* Blocks with a + symbol have variations available that you can scroll through.
localization.Description_Piston: The piston is an expandable block that allows the transfer of power and items.
localization.ScreenBlueprintsRew_Tooltip_SendToPlayer: Send blueprint to other players ({0} BP only)
localization.NotificationSuitEnergyLow: Warning: Suit energy is low. Life support systems may fail.
localization.Description_ShipGrinder: Ship grinders are utility tools for deconstructing grids. Can be used from a cockpit or turned on manually. Be careful not to get too close while it's active.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettingsAsteroidAmount: Density of procedurally generated asteroid fields
localization.NotificationHintJoystickPressToOpenInven: Access control menu to open inventory of {0}
localization.ProgrammableBlock_Exception_ExceptionCau: Caught exception during execution of script:
localization.SpectatorControls_None_Desc: Get back into controlled character / cockpit
localization.Description_RailingStraight: Railings stop engineers from falling off dangerous ledges. Safety first!
localization.Hint23Text:
Did you know?
    
    
Your suit's power drains faster when residing in cold or warm temperatures.
localization.Description_FAQ_LosingHealth: Are you suffocating? Standing in front of a thruster or perhaps you came too close to an active ship tool?
localization.ToolTipOptionsGraphics_QualityPreset: Choose a quality preset, according to your HW specifications
localization.Description_InteriorWall: Interior walls are blocks with emissive lights to function as interior walls, ceilings or floors.
localization.Description_FAQ_BlockRotation: You can turn on the block and grid rotations assist in the game options menu to see the rotation controls. Press {CONTROL:CUBE_DEFAULT_MOUNTPOINT} to rotate a block towards its default mount-point.
localization.ProgrammableBlock_Error_NotExperimental: Error: This world is not in experimental mode.
localization.ToolTipWorldSettings_EnableJetpack: If this is turned off, characters won't be able to use jetpacks at all
localization.Description_SafeZone: Projects safe zone around itself. Safe zone can be used to protect your assets
localization.Description_Bed: A bed for decorating interiors. Can preserve the players' inventory and toolbar while they're offline and keeps them alive as long as there is oxygen available in environment.
localization.Jump_ObstacleTruncation: Obstacle Detected! Jump Distance will be truncated. \n
localization.NotificationNoHelmetVariation: Cannot remove helmet on this suit.
localization.ScreenMedicals_ActivateSpectator_Confirm:
After enabling spectator mode from the respawn screen there is no
way back to the respawn screen! You will have to reload/reconnect
in order to respawn again.

Are you sure you wish to continue?
